entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}2 slashing damage plus 2 acid, cold, fire, or lightning damage (mage-gorger's choice), and until the start of the mage-gorger's next turn, the target has disadvantage on Constitution saving throws made to maintain {@status concentration}, including any Constitution saving throw triggered by this attack. Only one damage type is chosen for this attack regardless of how many mage-gorgers joined it.

trait.name: Rampaging Charge
entries: If the marauder moves at least 10 feet straight toward a creature and hits them with a Flail attack on the same turn, the marauder can make a Bite attack against that target as a bonus action.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Flail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) bludgeoning damage.

reaction.name: Death Frenzy
entries: When an ally the marauder can see within 30 feet of them is reduced to 0 hit points, the marauder moves up to half their speed and makes a Bite attack.

trait.name: Death Feast
entries: When an ally within 5 feet of the wildling is reduced to 0 hit points, the wildling can deal 1 piercing damage to a creature within 5 feet of them (no action required), provided the wildling isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Minion
entries: If the wildling takes damage from an attack or as the result of a failed saving throw, their hit points are reduced to 0. If the wildling takes damage from another effect, they die if the damage equals or exceeds their hit point maximum; otherwise they take no damage.

action.name: Flail (Group Attack)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}1 piercing damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} by each wildling who joined the attack (escape {@dc 10} plus the number of wildlings who have it {@condition grappled}). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}, and the wildling can't make a Flail attack against another creature. A wildling can choose to release the {@condition grappled} creature while other wildlings still have them {@condition grappled}, reducing the escape DC accordingly.

trait.name: Death Snap
entries: When the hyena is reduced to 0 hit points, they can deal {@damage 1} piercing damage to a creature within 5 feet of them (no action required), provided they weren't {@condition incapacitated} before dropping to 0 hit points.

trait.name: Minion
entries: If the hyena takes damage from an attack or as the result of a failed saving throw, their hit points are reduced to 0. If the hyena takes damage from another effect, they die if the damage equals or exceeds their hit point maximum; otherwise they take no damage.

action.name: Bite (Group Attack)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 1} piercing damage. If the target is a creature and two or more hyenas joined the attack, the target must succeed on a Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}. The DC for this saving throw equals 10 plus the number of hyenas who joined the attack.

trait.name: Lethe
entries: When the demon's soul count is 0, they have advantage on attack rolls, disadvantage on saving throws, and their Intelligence score becomes 3 (-4). Additionally, the demon must use their movement on each of their turns to move as close as possible to the nearest creature they can sense with their soulsight, and then if they are able, they must use their action to attack and attempt to kill that creature. The demon can't act with any other purpose until they add 1 to their soul count.

trait.name: Soul Devourer
entries: When the demon reduces a creature who isn't a Construct or an Undead to 0 hit points or deals damage to a dying creature, the creature must make a {@dc 11} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the demon consumes the creature's soul and adds 1 to the demon's soul count. A creature whose soul is consumed in this way immediately dies, and they can't be restored to life by any means short of a {@spell wish} spell.

trait.name: Trample
entries: The demon can move through the spaces of Large or smaller creatures as if they were difficult terrain. When the demon enters a creature's space for the first time on the demon's turn, the demon can make a Stomp attack against that creature (no action required). Additionally, the demon can end their turn in the space of a {@condition prone} creature who is Medium or smaller, and that creature can't stand up while in the demon's space.

action.name: Gore
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}19 ({@damage 3d8 + 6}) piercing damage. The demon can burn 1 soul to push the target up to 40 feet directly away from the demon.

action.name: Stomp
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d6 + 6}) bludgeoning damage, and if the target is a Medium or smaller creature, they must succeed on a {@dc 17} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Tongue
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 3d6 + 6}) slashing damage, and if the target is a creature, they must succeed on a {@dc 17} Strength saving throw or be pulled up to 10 feet toward the demon.

reaction.name: Vengeful Charge (Costs 1 Soul)
entries: When an enemy within 40 feet of the demon deals damage to the demon, the demon can move up to their speed straight toward them. If the demon ends this movement within 10 feet of the enemy, the demon can make a Gore attack against them.

hp.special: Eight times their level (number of d10 Hit Dice equal to their level)

action.name: Signature Attack (Bite)
entries: {@atk mw} +3 plus damage. Beginning at 7th level, the gnasher can make this attack twice, instead of once, when they take the Attack action on their turn.

action.name: 3rd Level: Frenzied Bite (3/Day)
entries: When a creature the gnasher can see within 30 feet of them is reduced to 0 hit points, the gnasher can use a reaction to move up to half their speed and then make a signature attack. On a hit, the attack deals an extra {@damage 0d1 + PB|PB} piercing damage.

action.name: 5th Level: Flurry of Fangs (3/Day)
entries: As an action, the gnasher makes a signature attack against up to PB creatures within 5 feet of them.

action.name: 7th Level: Horrific Feast (1/Day)
entries: When the gnasher reduces a creature to 0 hit points with their signature attack, they can consume part of the creature as part of the attack, gaining {@damage PBd10} temporary hit points. Each enemy within 30 feet of the gnasher who can see them must succeed on a {@dc 10 plus PB} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} of the gnasher until the end of the gnasher's next turn.

hp.special: 7 + seven times caregiver's level (number of d8 Hit Dice equal to their caregiver's level)

action.name: Signature Attack (Bite)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3 plus PB} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 1d6 plus PB} piercing damage.

action.name: 1st Level: Unbalancing Attack (2 Ferocity)
entries: The hyena makes a signature attack. On a hit, the target also has disadvantage on the next Strength or Dexterity saving throw they make before the start of their next turn.

action.name: 3rd Level: Gobbling Bite (5 Ferocity)
entries: The hyena makes a signature attack with advantage. On a hit, the attack deals an extra {@damage 0d1 + PB|PB} necrotic damage, and the hyena regains hit points equal to the necrotic damage dealt.

action.name: 5th Level: Cackle (8 Ferocity)
entries: Each enemy within 30 feet of the hyena who can hear them must succeed on a {@dc 10 plus PB} Wisdom saving throw or take {@damage PBd4} psychic damage and be {@condition frightened} of the hyena until the start of the hyena's next turn.

reaction.name: Blood Frenzy (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: When the hyena's caregiver is hit with an attack and the hyena is within 5 feet of the attacker, the hyena can make a signature attack against the attacker.

trait.name: Backstab
entries: When the assassin has advantage on their attack roll against a creature who isn't a Construct or an Undead, their attacks deal an extra 3 ({@damage 1d6}) damage and inflict a bleeding wound on the target that lasts until the bleeding creature regains at least 1 hit point. A bleeding creature loses 2 hit points for each bleeding wound they have at the start of their turn. Any creature who can reach the target can use an action to stanch all the target's wounds, ending the effect.

trait.name: Crafty
entries: The assassin doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when they move out of an enemy's reach.

action.name: Scimitar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Summon Shadows (1/Day)
entries: A 10-foot-radius sphere of magical darkness emanates from a point the assassin can see for 1 minute. The darkness spreads around corners. Except for the assassin, a creature with darkvision can't see through this darkness, and mundane light can't illuminate it. At the start of their turn, the assassin can move the darkness up to 30 feet to a point they can see (no action required). If the assassin takes damage, the effect ends.

bonus.name: Sneak
entries: The assassin takes the Hide action.

trait.name: Crafty
entries: The cursespitter doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when they move out of an enemy's reach.

action.name: Toxic Touch (Cantrip)
entries: {@atk ms,rs} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 2d6}) poison damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute (save ends at end of turn).

action.name: Brittle Bone Hex (Cantrip)
entries: The cursespitter chooses one creature they can see within 60 feet of them. The target's bones are wracked with pain until the end of their next turn. The first time the target willingly moves or uses an action, a bonus action, or a reaction before then, they must succeed on a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw or take 9 ({@damage 2d8}) necrotic damage.

action.name: To Me!
entries: The cursespitter chooses up to two willing creatures they can see within 30 feet of them. Each creature is teleported to an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the cursespitter.

action.name: Dizzying Hex (2/Day; 1st-Level Spell)
entries: The cursespitter chooses one creature they can see within 60 feet of them. The target must make a {@dc 12} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the target falls {@condition prone} and can't stand back up for 1 minute (save ends at end of turn).

reaction.name: Cowardly Commander
entries: When a creature the cursespitter can see hits them with an attack, the cursespitter chooses a willing ally within 5 feet of them. The attack hits the ally instead.

trait.name: Crafty
entries: The lackey doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when they move out of an enemy's reach.

trait.name: Minion
entries: If the lackey takes damage from an attack or as the result of a failed saving throw, their hit points are reduced to 0. If the lackey takes damage from another effect, they die if the damage equals or exceeds their hit point maximum; otherwise they take no damage.

trait.name: Tiny Stabs
entries: If an enemy starts their turn within 5 feet of three or more lackeys who can see them, the enemy must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or take 1 piercing damage for each lackey within 5 feet. The DC for this saving throw equals 10 + the number of lackeys within 5 feet of the enemy.

action.name: Dagger (Group Attack)
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 3} to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}1 piercing damage.

trait.name: Crafty
entries: The sniper doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when they move out of an enemy's reach.

trait.name: Sniper
entries: If the sniper misses with a ranged weapon attack while they are hidden, they remain hidden. Additionally, if the sniper hits a target with a ranged weapon attack while they have advantage on the attack roll, the attack deals an extra 3 ({@damage 1d6}) damage.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Shortbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage.

bonus.name: Sneak
entries: The sniper takes the Hide action.

trait.name: Crafty
entries: The spinecleaver doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when they move out of an enemy's reach.

trait.name: Strong Grip
entries: Wielding a heavy weapon doesn't impose disadvantage on the spinecleaver's attack rolls.

action.name: Greataxe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d12 + 3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Handaxe
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) slashing damage.

reaction.name: Tricksy Warrior
entries: When a creature within 5 feet of the spinecleaver misses them with an attack, the spinecleaver can make a melee attack against the creature with disadvantage.

trait.name: Crafty
entries: The underboss doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when they move out of an enemy's reach.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The underboss makes two Shortsword attacks or two Shortbow attacks. They can replace one attack with a use of Command.

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Shortbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Command
entries: The underboss chooses one ally they can see within 30 feet of them. If the target can hear the underboss, the target can use their reaction to move up to their speed or make one weapon attack.

bonus.name: Get Reckless {@recharge}
entries: Each willing ally within 30 feet of the underboss who can hear them becomes reckless until the start of the underboss's next turn. While reckless, a creature has advantage on attack rolls, and attack rolls against the creature have advantage.

reaction.name: Cowardly Commander
entries: When a creature the underboss can see hits them with an attack, the underboss chooses a willing ally within 5 feet of them. The attack hits the ally instead.

trait.name: Crafty
entries: The warrior doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when they move out of an enemy's reach.

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Shortbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage.

reaction.name: Fleet Foot
entries: When a creature within 5 feet of the warrior misses them with a melee attack, the warrior can move up to half their speed.

trait.name: Flyby
entries: The skitterling doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when they fly out of an enemy's reach.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}1 slashing damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 10} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition blinded} until the start of their next turn. Creatures who are immune to poison damage or the {@condition poisoned} condition succeed on this saving throw automatically.

trait.name: In Your Face
entries: While the swarm occupies an enemy's space, that creature has disadvantage on attack rolls made against any target other than the swarm and takes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) slashing damage if they attack a creature other than the swarm.

trait.name: Swarm
entries: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny skitterling. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 0 ft., one target in the swarm's space. {@h}14 ({@damage 4d6}) slashing damage, or 7 ({@damage 2d6}) slashing damage if the swarm has half of their hit points or fewer. The target must succeed on a {@dc 10} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition blinded} until the start of their next turn. Creatures who are immune to poison damage or the {@condition poisoned} condition succeed on this saving throw automatically.

trait.name: Baby Burst
entries: When the spider dies, a {@creature swarm of spiders|FleeMortals} bursts forth from their remains and acts on the same initiative count as the spider did.

trait.name: Rider Launcher
entries: An allied rider who jumps off the spider has a long jump of 30 feet and a high jump of 15 feet, with or without a running start. If an allied rider jumps off the spider, the first melee weapon attack the ally makes on the same turn has advantage.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The spider can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

trait.name: Web Walker
entries: The spider ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.

trait.name: Wide Back
entries: Two Small or Tiny creatures can share a space while riding the spider, allowing up to eighteen Small or seventy-two Tiny creatures to ride the spider at once.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) piercing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) poison damage.

action.name: Bladed Leg
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Web Spray
entries: The spider sprays webbing from their abdomen in a 15-foot cube. Each creature in that area must succeed on a {@dc 14} Dexterity saving throw or be {@condition restrained} by the webbing. A creature can use their action to make a {@dc 14} Strength or Dexterity check, freeing themself or another creature they can reach on a success.

action.name: Trample {@recharge}
entries: The spider can move up to their speed and move through the spaces of other creatures as if they were difficult terrain. The spider can make one Bladed Leg attack against each creature whose space they move into during the move. A creature hit by this attack can't take reactions until the start of their next turn.

monster.name: Queen Bargnot

trait.name: Crafty
entries: Queen Bargnot doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when she moves out of an enemy's reach.

trait.name: Take My Pain (3/Day)
entries: When Queen Bargnot fails a saving throw against a spell or other supernatural effect, she can choose a willing creature within 30 feet of her. Queen Bargnot succeeds on the saving throw, the creature is targeted with the same spell or effect as if they were in her space, and they fail their saving throw automatically.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Queen Bargnot makes three Shortsword attacks or two Shortbow attacks.

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Shortbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage.

bonus.name: Get In Here
entries: Queen Bargnot shouts for aid and {@dice 1d4} {@creature goblin lackey|FleeMortals}s appear in unoccupied spaces within 60 feet of her.

reaction.name: No Dying!
entries: When an ally Queen Bargnot can see within 30 feet of her is reduced to 0 hit points, they are reduced to 1 hit point instead.

legendaryHeader: Queen Bargnot has three villain actions. She can take each action once during an encounter after an enemy's turn.
She can take these actions in any order but can use only one per round.

legendary.name: Action 1: What Are You Waiting For?!
entries: Each ally within 60 feet of Queen Bargnot who can hear her can move up to their speed or make a melee weapon attack (no action required).

legendary.name: Action 2: Focus Fire
entries: Queen Bargnot chooses an enemy she can see with 60 feet of her. Queen Bargnot and each ally within 60 feet of her who can hear her can move up to their speed toward the target.

legendary.name: Action 3: Kill!
entries: Each ally within 60 feet of Queen Bargnot who can hear her can make a weapon attack with advantage (no action required). If the attack hits, it deals an extra 3 ({@damage 1d6}) damage.

hp.special: Seven times their level (number of d8 Hit Dice equal to their level)

action.name: Signature Attack (Daggers)
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 3 plus PB} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 2d4 plus PB} piercing damage. Beginning at 7th level, the sneak can make this attack twice, instead of once, when they take the Attack action on their turn.

action.name: 3rd Level: Weaving Knives (3/Day)
entries: As an action, the sneak moves up to their speed without provoking opportunity attacks. Before, during, or after the move, they can make two signature attacks.

action.name: 5th Level: Sneak and Stab (3/Day)
entries: As a bonus action, the sneak takes the Hide action. If the sneak hits a creature they are hidden from with an attack on the same turn, the creature takes an extra {@damage PBd10} piercing damage, and the sneak can immediately take the Hide action (no action required).

action.name: 7th Level: Poisoned Blade (1/Day)
entries: As a bonus action, the sneak covers a dagger in a special poison, which lasts for 1 hour or until the sneak hits a creature with a signature attack. A creature hit with the {@condition poisoned} dagger must make a {@dc 10 plus PB} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes {@damage PBd12} poison damage and is {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute (save ends at the end of turn). On a successful save, the target takes only half as much damage and isn't {@condition poisoned}.

hp.special: 6 + six times caregiver's level (number of d8 Hit Dice equal to their caregiver's level)

action.name: Signature Attack (Claws)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3 plus PB} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 1d6 plus PB} slashing damage.

action.name: 1st Level: Destabilizing Attack (2 Ferocity)
entries: The skitterling makes a signature attack. On a hit, the target also has disadvantage on the next attack roll they make before the start of the skitterling's next turn.

action.name: 3rd Level: Ankle Biter (5 Ferocity)
entries: The skitterling moves up to their speed without provoking opportunity attacks and makes a signature attack. On a hit, if the target is a Medium or smaller creature, they are also knocked {@condition prone} and {@condition grappled} by the skitterling (escape {@dc 10 plus PB}).

action.name: 5th Level: In All Your Faces! (8 Ferocity)
entries: The skitterling chaotically bounces around, smearing toxin on each enemy within 5 feet of them.

Each target must succeed on a {@dc 10 plus PB} Constitution saving throw or take {@damage 1d6 plus PB} poison damage and be {@condition blinded} until the end of the skitterling's next turn. A creature within 5 feet of a target {@condition blinded} in this way can use their action to wipe the toxin off them, ending the condition for that target.

bonus.name: Crafty Distraction (Recharges after a Long Rest)
entries: The skitterling flutters and screeches distractingly, allowing their caregiver an opportunity to reposition. The caregiver can use a reaction to move up to their speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

hp.special: 7 + seven times caregiver's level (number of d8 Hit Dice equal to their caregiver's level)

trait.name: Move as One
entries: While the worg's caregiver is mounted on the worg, opportunity attacks against the worg or their caregiver are made with disadvantage. The worg's caregiver can mount or dismount the worg by spending 5 feet of movement.

action.name: Signature Attack (Bite)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3 plus PB} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 1d6 plus PB} piercing damage.

action.name: 1st Level: Overwhelming Attack (2 Ferocity)
entries: The worg makes a signature attack. On a hit, the attack deals an extra {@damage 0d1 + PB|PB} damage, and the target can't take reactions until the start of the worg's next turn.

action.name: 3rd Level: Brutal Charge (5 Ferocity)
entries: The worg moves up to their speed without provoking opportunity attacks. During or at the end of this move, they can make a signature attack against one target.

action.name: 5th Level: Bite Rampage (8 Ferocity)
entries: The worg makes signature attacks against PB creatures of their choice within 5 feet of them. On a hit, a target is knocked {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Steady
entries: The griffon has advantage on ability checks and saving throws against being knocked {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Swoop
entries: If the griffon flies more than 20 feet in a straight line toward their target and then hits them with a Claw attack on the same turn, the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 14}). While the target is {@condition grappled} in this way, the griffon has advantage on Beak attacks against the target but can't make Claw attacks. Grappling a Medium or smaller creature imposes no penalty on the griffon's speed.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The griffon makes one Beak attack, and they can make one Claw attack, use Buffet, or use Piercing Cry.

action.name: Beak
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d4 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Buffet
entries: The griffon beats their wings in mighty gusts of wind. Each creature not {@condition grappled} by the griffon within a 30-foot cone originating from the griffon must make a {@dc 14} Strength saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 5 ({@damage 2d4}) bludgeoning damage, is pushed 5 feet away from the griffon, and is knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Piercing Cry
entries: The griffon lets out an earsplitting screech. Each enemy within 60 feet of the griffon who can hear them must succeed on a {@dc 12} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} of the griffon for 1 minute (save ends at end of turn). If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for them, they are immune to the Piercing Cry of all griffons for the next 24 hours.

hp.special: 7 + seven times caregiver's level (number of d8 Hit Dice equal to their caregiver's level)

trait.name: Learning to Fly
entries: The griffon has a flying speed of 10 × PB feet.

action.name: Signature Attack (Beak)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3 plus PB} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 1d6 plus PB} piercing damage.

action.name: 1st Level: Violent Attack (2 Ferocity)
entries: The griffon makes a signature attack. On a hit, the attack deals an extra {@damage 0d1 + PB|PB} slashing damage, and the griffon can move the target 5 feet in any direction.

action.name: 3rd Level: Grabbed from Above (5 Ferocity)
entries: The griffon makes a signature attack against a Medium or smaller creature. On a hit, the target is also {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 10 plus PB}) if they weren't already. While {@condition grappled} in this way, the target is {@condition restrained} and the griffon can't make a signature attack against another target.

action.name: 3rd Level: Bombs Away (5 Ferocity)
entries: The griffon flies up to their speed without provoking opportunity attacks. If the griffon has a creature {@condition grappled}, the grapple doesn't halve the griffon's speed and the griffon can end the grapple at any point during this movement. If the griffon ends the grapple before the end of their turn and the target takes bludgeoning damage from that fall, the target takes an extra {@damage 0d1 + PB|PB} bludgeoning damage.

action.name: 5th Level: Backdraft (8 Ferocity)
entries: The griffon flies up to their speed without provoking opportunity attacks. When the griffon ends this movement, each creature within 15 feet of them must make a {@dc 10 plus PB} Strength saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes {@damage PBd6} bludgeoning damage and is knocked {@condition prone}. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and isn't knocked {@condition prone}.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting (Utility)
headerEntries: In addition to any other spells in this stat block, the hag can cast the following spells, using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 14}):

trait.name: Envenom
entries: Each ally within 30 feet of the hag deals an extra 3 ({@damage 1d6}) poison damage with weapon attacks, provided the hag isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The hag makes one Poison Claw attack and uses Granny Says.

action.name: Poison Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) slashing damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) poison damage.

action.name: Granny Says
entries: The hag affects one other willing creature they can see within 30 feet of them with one of the following effects:

items: The target magically switches places with the hag.
The target uses their reaction, if available, to make an attack.

action.name: Naughty Mousey (3/Day; 5th-Level Spell; Concentration)
entries: The hag chooses a creature they can see within 60 feet of them and attempts to transform them into a Beast of the hag's choice with a challenge rating of 2 or lower. The target must succeed on a {@dc 14} Wisdom saving throw or be transformed for 1 minute (save ends at end of turn). While transformed, the target's game statistics are replaced by the statistics of the chosen Beast, though they retain their alignment, personality, and Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma scores. The target's gear melds into the new form. They can't activate, use, wield, or otherwise benefit from any of their equipment. They can't speak or cast spells but can take any action the Beast can take. If the target drops to 0 hit points while in this form, they revert back to their original form with half the number of hit points they had before they transformed.

reaction.name: Get Gone
entries: When an ally within 30 feet of the hag is targeted with an attack, the hag can turn the target {@condition invisible} until the start of the target's next turn, potentially imposing disadvantage on the triggering attack roll and causing it to miss. To use this reaction, the hag must be able to see the ally and the attacker.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting (Utility)
headerEntries: In addition to any other spells in this stat block, the hag can cast the following spells, using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 15}):

trait.name: Supernatural Resistance
entries: The hag has advantage on saving throws against powers, spells, and other supernatural effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The hag makes two Dream Claw attacks.

action.name: Dream Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) slashing damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) psychic damage. If a target is hit by this attack more than once on a turn, they must make a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target falls {@condition unconscious} for 1 minute (save ends at end of turn), until the target takes damage, or until another creature who can reach the target uses their action to wake them. Creatures who can't be supernaturally put to sleep automatically succeed on this saving throw.

action.name: Vicious Visions (1/Day; 6th-Level Spell)
entries: The hag releases magic dream dust in a 60-foot cone. Each creature must succeed on a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition charmed} for 1 minute or until they deal damage to another creature. While {@condition charmed}, the creature sees all allies as enemies and all enemies as allies.

action.name: Tiny Time
entries: The hag magically shrinks down to a height of 1 inch, becoming Tiny along with any items they wear or carry. While Tiny, the hag has advantage on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) checks made to hide, and they can use a bonus action to enter the head of an {@condition unconscious} Humanoid they can reach or to grow back to the hag's normal size. The hag's game statistics otherwise remain the same.

While the hag is inside a Humanoid's head, that Humanoid is considered haunted by the hag, and the hag has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the head. The hag can speak telepathically to the haunted Humanoid, but the Humanoid is unaware of the source of this telepathic speech. The haunted Humanoid can't gain any benefit from rest unless the hag allows it, and when the Humanoid attempts to sleep, the hag can fill the Humanoid's mind with nightmarish visions.

The hag is expelled from the head and grows back to their normal size if the haunted Humanoid is affected by a {@spell dispel evil and good} spell or similar supernatural effects, or if the hag chooses to exit the head as a bonus action.

bonus.name: Sleepwalk
entries: The hag moves one {@condition unconscious} creature they can see within 60 feet of them up to 30 feet horizontally.

reaction.name: Aren't You Tired?
entries: When a creature within 5 feet of the hag hits them with an attack, the hag spits sleep dust at the attacker. The attacker must make a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, until the end of the hag's next turn, the attacker feels tremendously sleepy, they can't take reactions, and they have disadvantage on attack rolls and saving throws. Creatures who can't be supernaturally put to sleep are immune to this effect.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting (Utility)
headerEntries: In addition to any other spells in this stat block, the hag can cast the following spells, using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 13}):
will: {@spell create or destroy water}{@sup {@cite Casting Times|FleeMortals|A}}

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The hag can breathe both air and water.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The hag makes one Lightning Strike attack and uses Dry Drowning.

action.name: Lightning Strike
entries: {@atk ms,rs} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 120 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 3d6}) lightning damage.

action.name: Dry Drowning
entries: The hag chooses a creature they can see within 120 feet of them, making the target feel as though their lungs are filling with water. The target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition dazed|FleeMortals} until the start of the hag's next turn. A creature who can breathe water or who doesn't need air automatically succeeds on this saving throw.

bonus.name: Sea Storm (1/Day; 3rd-Level Spell; Concentration)
entries: The hag creates a roiling storm with a 60-foot radius centered on themself that moves with them and lasts for 1 minute. The hag has advantage on Lightning Strike attacks against targets in that area, and those attacks deal an extra 3 ({@damage 1d6}) lightning damage.

reaction.name: Fearsome Glare
entries: When a creature the hag can see within 30 feet of them hits the hag with an attack, that creature must succeed on a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} of the hag until the end of the hag's next turn.

monster.name: Shtriga Nonna

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting (Utility)
headerEntries: In addition to any other spells in this stat block, Shtriga Nonna can cast the following spells, using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 15}):

trait.name: Feline Resilience (3/Day)
entries: When Shtriga Nonna fails a saving throw, she can immediately turn into a cat of her size (Medium in her normal form, Large while under the effect of Grow) and succeed instead. While in cat form, Shtriga Nonna retains her game statistics and ability to speak, except she can't cast spells or use Soul Steal. She reverts to her previous form at the end of her next turn.

trait.name: Supernatural Resistance
entries: Shtriga Nonna has advantage on saving throws against powers, spells, and other supernatural effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Shtriga Nonna makes two Corrosive Claw attacks. She can replace one attack with a use of Soul Steal, if available.

action.name: Corrosive Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft. (10 ft. with Grow), one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) slashing damage, or 14 ({@damage 3d6 + 4}) slashing damage while under the effect of Grow. If the target is wearing mundane metal armor, they must succeed on a {@dc 15} Dexterity throw or their armor takes a permanent and cumulative -1 penalty to the AC it offers. If the armor is reduced to an AC of 10, it is destroyed.

action.name: Soul Steal {@recharge 5}
entries: Shtriga Nonna inhales deeply in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw, taking 16 ({@damage 3d10}) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. Shtriga Nonna regains 10 hit points for each creature who fails this saving throw.

bonus.name: Grow (2/Day; 3rd-Level Spell)
entries: For 1 minute, Shtriga Nonna magically increases in size, along with anything she is wearing or carrying. While enlarged, she is Large, her reach becomes 10 feet, she deals an extra 3 ({@damage 1d6}) damage on Strength-based weapon attacks (included in the attacks), and she makes Strength checks and Strength saving throws with advantage. If Shtriga Nonna lacks the room to become Large, she attains the maximum size possible in the space available.

bonus.name: Gobble You Up
entries: Shtriga Nonna feeds on the body of an {@condition unconscious} creature within 5 feet of her. The target takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) piercing damage, and Shtriga Nonna recharges her Soul Steal action.

reaction.name: Turned Upside Down
entries: When a creature hits Shtriga Nonna with a melee attack, she magically reverses gravity around her. Each creature within 5 feet of her must succeed on a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw or rise vertically 10 feet into the air. A creature levitating in this way remains suspended until the end of their next turn, then falls unless they have an ability that keeps them aloft.

legendaryHeader: Shtriga Nonna has three villain actions. She can take each action once during an encounter after an enemy's turn. She can take these actions in any order but can use only one per round.

legendary.name: Action 1: Snackies for Sweeties
entries: The air within 30 feet of Shtriga Nonna magically fills with the scent of rotten food. Each other creature in that area must succeed on a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute (save ends at end of turn). Creatures are affected even if they hold their breath or don't need to breathe.

legendary.name: Action 2: Feline Felicity
entries: Shtriga Nonna grows four cat legs in a burst of magical energy. Each creature within 5 feet of her must make a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 10 ({@damage 4d4}) force damage and is pushed 10 feet away from her. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and isn't pushed. Shtriga Nonna can then move up to twice her speed, after which the extra cat legs disappear.

legendary.name: Action 3: Open the Oven
entries: Shtriga Nonna opens a portal to her massive oven in the palms of her hands, creating a blast of heat and noise in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw, taking 13 ({@damage 3d8}) fire damage plus 13 ({@damage 3d8}) thunder damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

hp.special: Six times their level (number of d6 Hit Dice equal to their level)

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The apprentice can breathe air and water.

action.name: Signature Attack (Zap)
entries: {@atk ms,rs} {@hit 3 plus PB} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 60 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d8}) lightning damage. This spell's damage increases by {@dice 1d8} when the apprentice reaches 5th level ({@dice 2d8}), 11th level ({@dice 3d8}), and 17th level ({@dice 4d8}).

action.name: 3rd Level: Wash Away (3/Day)
entries: As a bonus action, the apprentice rides a crashing wave. They make a signature attack against an enemy within 5 feet of them and move up to their walking speed without provoking opportunity attacks. If the attack hits, it deals an extra {@damage 0d1 + PB|PB} bludgeoning damage.

action.name: 5th Level: Ride the Lightning (3/Day)
entries: As an action, the apprentice supercharges their foe's nervous system. The apprentice makes a signature attack, and if it deals damage to a creature, the target must make a {@dc 10 plus PB} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target is {@condition incapacitated} and their speed is halved until the end of their next turn.

action.name: 7th Level: Drown (1/Day)
entries: As an action, the apprentice chooses three creatures the apprentice can see within 60 feet of them. Each target feels as though their lungs are filling with water and must make a {@dc 10 plus PB} Constitution saving throw. A creature who can breathe water or who doesn't need air automatically succeeds on this saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage PBd8} force damage, and for 1 minute, they can't speak, their speed is halved, and they are {@condition dazed|FleeMortals} (save ends at end of turn). On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage and suffers no other effect. Another creature within 5 feet of a target can use their action to make a {@dc 10 plus PB} Strength ({@skill Athletics}) or Intelligence ({@skill Medicine}) check, ending the effect on a success.

trait.name: Echolocation
entries: The harpy can't use their blindsight while {@condition deafened}.

action.name: Talons
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 3d4 + 2}) slashing damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature {@condition charmed} by the harpy, they are also {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 12}). Until this grapple ends, the harpy can't use their Talons attack on another target.

action.name: Rock
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 2d4 + 2}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Alluring Song
entries: The harpy starts singing a beautiful song. They continue singing until they choose to stop (no action required) or until they become {@condition deafened} or {@condition incapacitated}. When a non-harpy creature starts their turn within 200 feet of the singing harpy, if that creature shares a language with the harpy and can hear them, that creature must succeed on a {@dc 12} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition charmed} by the harpy until the harpy stops singing or the target can't hear them anymore.

While {@condition charmed} in this way, the target can't willingly move on their turn, and they can't attack, damage, or target any unwilling harpy with any effect. If the {@condition charmed} target takes damage from a source other than a harpy, they can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on a success.
A creature who succeeds on a saving throw to resist or end this effect is immune to the Alluring Song of all harpies for 1 hour.

bonus.name: Beckon
entries: The harpy chooses any number of creatures {@condition charmed} by their Alluring Song. Each target must use their reaction, if available, to move up to their speed in a direction chosen by the harpy. If this movement would lead the target into hazardous terrain, they can make a {@dc 12} Wisdom saving throw before moving. On a successful save, the target's reaction is not used and they are no longer {@condition charmed} by Alluring Song.

trait.name: Chorus of Death
entries: If the starving harpy hears a harpy's Alluring Song, they can start harmonizing (no action required). The starving harpy continues harmonizing until the song ends, until they choose to stop harmonizing, or until they become {@condition deafened} or {@condition incapacitated}. For each starving harpy harmonizing, the range of the song increases by 50 feet, and the save DCs for the singing harpy's Alluring Song action and Beckon bonus action both increase by 1 (maximum DC increase of 5).

trait.name: Echolocation
entries: The harpy can't use their blindsight while {@condition deafened}.

trait.name: Minion
entries: If the harpy takes damage from an attack or as the result of a failed saving throw, their hit points are reduced to 0. If the harpy takes damage from another effect, they die if the damage equals or exceeds their hit point maximum; otherwise they take no damage.

action.name: Grasping Talons (Group Attack)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}1 piercing damage, and if the target is a creature, the harpies can move them 5 feet in any direction. If the attack was made by three or more harpies, they can move the target 10 feet instead of 5.

hp.special: Seven times their level (number of d8 Hit Dice equal to their level)

trait.name: Echolocation
entries: The harpy can't use their blindsight while {@condition deafened}.

action.name: Signature Attack (Talons)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3 plus PB} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 2d4 plus PB} slashing damage. Beginning at 7th level, the fledgling can make this attack twice, instead of once, when they take the Attack action on their turn.

action.name: 3rd Level: Wind Sweep (3/Day)
entries: As a bonus action, the fledgling moves up to their flying speed without provoking opportunity attacks. If they end this movement within 5 feet of an enemy they can see, the fledgling can make a signature attack against them.

action.name: 5th Level: Food Grab (3/Day)
entries: When the fledgling hits a Medium or smaller creature with a signature attack, the target is also {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 10 plus PB}). The fledging then moves up to their fly speed without provoking opportunity attacks (no action required). While grappling the target, the fledgling can't attack another creature.

action.name: 7th Level: Harpy Song (1/Day)
entries: As an action, the fledgling starts singing for 1 minute. Each creature within 60 feet of the fledgling who can hear them and who understands Common or Giant must succeed on a {@dc 10 plus PB} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition charmed} by the fledgling until they can't hear the fledgling singing anymore. While {@condition charmed} in this way, a creature can't willingly harm any of the fledgling's allies.

monster.name: Hellhound
languages: understands Common and Infernal but can't speak

trait.name: Hardened by Flame
entries: When the hound is subjected to fire damage, they take no damage. Instead, their skin darkens and hardens, and their AC increases to 18 until the end of their next turn.

trait.name: Stealthy Hunter
entries: The hound has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Survival}) checks to track other creatures and on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) checks to hide from creatures who are unaware of their presence.

action.name: Hellish Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) fire damage.

action.name: Hellfire Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The hound exhales flame in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 14} Dexterity saving throw, taking 14 ({@damage 3d6 + 4}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. A creature who isn't a hellhound who fails the saving throw is lit on fire for 1 minute (save ends at end of turn), or until the target or another creature who can reach them uses an action to extinguish the flames. A creature who is on fire at the start of their turn takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage. If a creature who is already on fire is set on fire again on a subsequent turn, the damage isn't cumulative, but the duration of the fire resets to 1 minute.

reaction.name: Tug of War
entries: When an enemy within 5 feet of the hound hits the hound with a melee attack, the hound can make a Hellish Bite attack against that enemy. If the hound's attack hits, the enemy is also {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 12}), and if the triggering attack was a weapon attack, the weapon used in the triggering attack can't be used to make any more attacks while the target is {@condition grappled}. The grapple ends if the hound attacks a different target with Hellish Bite.

monster.name: Hellhound Cur
languages: understands Common and Infernal but can't speak

trait.name: Crossfire
entries: If a creature starts their turn within 10 feet of two or more curs, that creature takes {@damage 4} fire damage.

trait.name: Minion
entries: If the cur takes damage from an attack or as the result of a failed saving throw, their hit points are reduced to 0. If the cur takes damage from another effect, they die if the damage equals or exceeds their hit point maximum; otherwise they take no damage.

action.name: Hellish Bite (Group Attack)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 3} fire damage, and if the target isn't a hellhound and the attack was made by more than one cur, the target must make a Dexterity saving throw with a DC equal to 10 plus the number of curs who joined the attack. On a failed save, the target is lit on fire for 1 minute (save ends at end of turn), or until the target or another creature who can reach them uses an action to extinguish the flames. A creature who is on fire at the start of their turn takes fire damage equal to the number of curs who joined the attack. If a creature who is already on fire is set on fire again on a subsequent turn, the damage isn't cumulative, but the duration of the fire resets to 1 minute.

hp.special: 7 + seven times caregiver's level (number of d8 Hit Dice equal to their caregiver's level)

trait.name: Consult Hell (Recharges after a Long Rest)
entries: The hound's caregiver can talk to the hound about a specific course of action that the caregiver plans to take within the next 30 minutes, tapping into divinatory power through the hound's connection to the infernal realm. After 1 minute, the hound then gives a response based on its own objective prophetic sense of the outcome: one bark for good results, two barks for bad results, three barks for both good and bad results, and no barks for results that aren't especially good or bad.

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
entries: The hound has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

action.name: Bite (Signature Attack)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3 plus PB} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 1d6 plus PB} piercing damage.

action.name: 1st Level: Lava Spittle (2 Ferocity)
entries: The hound makes a signature attack. On a hit, the attack deals an extra {@damage 0d1 + PB|PB} damage, and the hound can choose another creature within 5 feet of the target, dealing PB fire damage to that creature.

action.name: 3rd Level: Brutal Charge (5 Ferocity)
entries: The hound can move up to their speed without provoking opportunity attacks. During or at the end of this move, they can make a signature attack against one target within reach.

action.name: 5th Level: Fire Breath (8 Ferocity)
entries: The hound exhales fire in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 10 plus PB} Dexterity saving throw, taking {@damage PBd6} fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

trait.name: Infernal Ichor
entries: When a creature within 5 feet of the brandbearer reduces the brandbearer to 0 hit points, the brandbearer's corpse unleashes a spray of burning orange ichor. The creature who reduced the brandbearer to 0 hit points takes {@damage 1} fire damage.

trait.name: Minion
entries: If the brandbearer takes damage from an attack or as the result of a failed saving throw, their hit points are reduced to 0. If the brandbearer takes damage from another effect, they die if the damage equals or exceeds their hit point maximum; otherwise they take no damage.

trait.name: Too Hot to Handle
entries: Whenever an enemy takes fire damage from a non-minion creature, the enemy takes an extra {@damage 1} fire damage for each brandbearer within 5 feet of them.

action.name: Searing Grasp (Group Attack)
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 4} fire damage. If three or more brandbearers joined the attack, the target has disadvantage on saving throws against powers, spells, and other supernatural effects that deal fire damage until the start of the brandbearer's next turn.

trait.name: Battle Ready
entries: The captain and each ally within 60 feet of them who can hear them have advantage on initiative rolls and can't be surprised, provided the captain isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Infernal Ichor
entries: When the captain dies, their corpse unleashes a spray of burning orange ichor. Each creature within 5 feet of the captain takes 5 fire damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The captain makes two Blightblade or two Eye Fire attacks. They can replace one attack with a use of On My Mark.

action.name: Blightblade
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) slashing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Eye Fire
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 6} to hit, range 60 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 4d6}) fire damage.

action.name: On My Mark
entries: The captain commands an ally within 60 feet of them who can hear them to attack. That ally can make a weapon attack (no action required), dealing an extra 3 ({@damage 1d6}) necrotic damage on a hit.

bonus.name: Lead the Charge (1/Day)
entries: The captain and each ally within 30 feet of them who can see them can move up to their speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

reaction.name: Hidden Gift (3/Day)
entries: When an ally the captain can see within 30 feet of them takes damage, the captain magically turns that ally {@condition invisible}. The ally remains {@condition invisible} until the end of their next turn or until they attack, deal damage, or force another creature to make a saving throw.

trait.name: Fiery Leap
entries: The firerunner's long jump is up to 30 feet and their high jump is up to 15 feet, with or without a running start. The first time a firerunner lands after a jump on their turn, each creature within 5 feet of them takes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) fire damage.

trait.name: Infernal Ichor
entries: When the firerunner dies, their corpse unleashes a spray of burning orange ichor. Each creature within 5 feet of the firerunner takes 5 fire damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The firerunner makes two Fire Scimitar attacks.

action.name: Fire Scimitar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) slashing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage.

action.name: Blaze Sprint {@recharge 5}
entries: The firerunner moves up to their speed without provoking opportunity attacks. Each creature they come within 5 feet of during this movement must make a {@dc 14} Dexterity saving throw, taking 10 ({@damage 3d6}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

trait.name: Infernal Ichor
entries: When the incendiarist dies, their corpse unleashes a spray of burning orange ichor. Each creature within 5 feet of the incendiarist takes 3 fire damage.

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Blazing Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) piercing damage, and if the target is a creature, they are set on fire. While on fire, the target takes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) fire damage at the end of each of their turns, and the target or another creature who can reach them can use an action to put out the flames. A creature who is already on fire suffers no additional effect from being set on fire in this way again.

action.name: Fire Mote {@recharge}
entries: The incendiarist shoots an explosive mote of fire at a creature they can see within 100 feet of them. The target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw or take 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage and, if they are Large or smaller, fall {@condition prone}. All other creatures within 15 feet of the target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw or take 3 ({@damage 1d6}) fire damage.

trait.name: Infernal Ichor
entries: When a creature within 5 feet of the recruit reduces the recruit to 0 hit points, the recruit's corpse unleashes a spray of burning orange ichor. The creature who reduced the recruit to 0 hit points takes 1 fire damage.

trait.name: Minion
entries: If the recruit takes damage from an attack or as the result of a failed saving throw, their hit points are reduced to 0. If the recruit takes damage from another effect, they die if the damage equals or exceeds their hit point maximum; otherwise they take no damage.

trait.name: Tactical Positioning
entries: When a non-minion ally attacks a creature, that ally gains a +1 bonus to the attack roll for each recruit within 5 feet of the target (maximum bonus of +5).

action.name: Longsword (Group Attack)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 1} slashing damage.

resist.note: from mundane attacks in smoke form

trait.name: Amorphous (Smoke Form Only)
entries: The smokebinder can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

trait.name: Infernal Ichor
entries: When the smokebinder dies, their corpse unleashes a spray of burning orange ichor. Each creature within 5 feet of the smokebinder takes 3 fire damage.

action.name: Toxic Flame
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 3d6}) fire damage. If the smokebinder has advantage on the attack roll, the target is {@condition poisoned} and can't speak until the end of the target's next turn.

action.name: Choking Bolt
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 5} to hit, range 60 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d8}) fire damage. If the smokebinder has advantage on the attack roll, the target can't speak until the end of the target's next turn.

bonus.name: Smoke Form (1/Day)
entries: The smokebinder transforms from flesh into a magical gray smoke for 1 minute. Any equipment they are wearing or carrying is also transformed for the duration.

While in smoke form, the smokebinder gains a flying speed equal to their walking speed, resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage from mundane attacks, and immunity to the {@condition grappled} and {@condition restrained} conditions.
The smokebinder can revert to their true form as a bonus action. If the smokebinder becomes {@condition incapacitated} or dies, they revert to their true form.

bonus.name: Sneak (Smoke Form Only)
entries: The smokebinder takes the Hide action.

trait.name: Infernal Ichor
entries: When the trooper dies, their corpse unleashes a spray of burning orange ichor. Each creature within 5 feet of the trooper takes 2 fire damage.

action.name: Fire Flail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) bludgeoning damage, and another target within 5 feet of the first takes 2 ({@damage 1d4}) fire damage.

action.name: Brimstone Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/60 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage plus 2 ({@damage 1d4}) fire damage.

bonus.name: Fight Me, Coward
entries: The trooper hexes a creature within 5 feet of them who isn't already hexed by another trooper. The first time on a turn a hexed creature damages a creature other than the trooper, the hexed creature takes 5 fire damage. The hex lasts until the start of the trooper's next turn.

trait.name: Infernal Ichor
entries: When the mage dies, their corpse unleashes a spray of burning orange ichor. Each creature within 5 feet of the mage takes 5 fire damage.

action.name: Infernal Teleport
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d10}) necrotic damage, and if the target is a creature, they must succeed on a {@dc 14} Charisma saving throw or be teleported up to 15 feet to an unoccupied space the mage can see.

action.name: Rain Hellfire (2nd-Level Spell)
entries: The mage rains fire down on a point they can see within 60 feet of them. Each creature in a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a {@dc 14} Dexterity saving throw, taking 10 ({@damage 3d6}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The fire spreads around corners, and it ignites flammable objects in that area that aren't being worn or carried.

action.name: Unhallowed Ground (3rd-Level Spell; Concentration)
entries: The mage chooses a point on the ground that they can see within 60 feet of them. A 20-foot square of glowing, unholy energy appears on the ground centered on that point and lasts for up to 1 minute. Each enemy in that area is vulnerable to fire damage.

reaction.name: Spell Siphon
entries: When a creature the mage can see within 60 feet of them casts a spell, the mage reflects some of the spell's magical energy back at the caster. The caster must succeed on a {@dc 14} Dexterity saving throw or take 3 ({@damage 1d6}) force damage per level of the triggering spell (minimum {@damage 1d6} force damage).

trait.name: Shifting Camouflage
entries: The grilp has advantage on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) checks and can hide from creatures who are observing them.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage, and if the target is a creature, they must succeed on a {@dc 11} Constitution saving throw or gain vulnerability to fire and necrotic damage until the start of the grilp's next turn.

action.name: Necrotic Mote
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 3} to hit, range 30 ft., one target. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d6}) necrotic damage.

trait.name: Lethe
entries: When the demon's soul count is 0, they have advantage on attack rolls, disadvantage on saving throws, and their Intelligence score becomes 3 (-4). Additionally, the demon must use their movement on each of their turns to move as close as possible to the nearest creature they can sense with their soulsight, and then if they are able, they must use their action to attack and attempt to kill that creature. The demon can't act with any other purpose until they add 1 to their soul count.

trait.name: Soul Devourer
entries: When the demon reduces a creature who isn't a Construct or an Undead to 0 hit points or deals damage to a dying creature, the creature must make a {@dc 11} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the demon consumes the creature's soul and adds 1 to the demon's soul count. A creature whose soul is consumed in this way immediately dies, and they can't be restored to life by any means short of a {@spell wish} spell.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The demon makes four attacks using Pincer, Sword, Javelin, or a combination of them. They can replace one of these attacks with a Tail Spike attack. The demon can burn 1 soul to make a fifth attack using Pincer, Sword, or Javelin.

action.name: Pincer
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d6 + 6}) bludgeoning damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 17}). While {@condition grappled}, the target is {@condition restrained}. The demon has six pincers, each of which can grapple a target or wield a weapon.

action.name: Sword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d8 + 6}) slashing damage.

action.name: Javelin
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 10 ft. or range 60/240 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d6 + 6}) piercing damage.

action.name: Tail Spike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 1d10 + 6}) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute (save ends at end of turn).

bonus.name: Dive Deep (Costs 1 Soul)
entries: The demon takes the Disengage action and gains a burrowing speed equal to their walking speed until the end of their next turn.

monster.name: Bloodlord Varrox

trait.name: Infernal Ichor
entries: When Varrox dies, his corpse unleashes a spray of burning orange ichor. Each creature within 5 feet of him takes 5 fire damage.

trait.name: Infernal Sacrifice (3/Day)
entries: When Varrox fails a saving throw, he can call on Hell to succeed instead. When he does, each ally within 60 feet of him takes 5 necrotic damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Varrox makes three attacks using Soulsword, Death Skulls, or both.

action.name: Soulsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) slashing damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) necrotic damage. If the target is a creature, they can't regain hit points until the start of Varrox's next turn.

action.name: Death Skulls
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 7} to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) piercing damage plus 9 ({@damage 2d8}) fire damage, and Varrox can teleport to an unoccupied space he can see within 5 feet of the target.

bonus.name: Advance and Attack
entries: Varrox barks orders at one ally within 60 feet of him who can hear him. That ally can use their reaction to move up to their speed and make a weapon attack.

reaction.name: An Army from Blood
entries: When a non-minion hobgoblin who Varrox can see within 60 feet of him takes damage, Varrox magically summons three hobgoblin recruits who appear in unoccupied spaces nearest to the damaged hobgoblin.

legendaryHeader: Varrox has three villain actions. He can take each action once during an encounter after an enemy's turn. He can take these actions in any order but can use only one per round.

legendary.name: Action 1: Uncanny Leadership
entries: Varrox chooses up to six non-minion allies within 60 feet of him who can see or hear him. Varrox and each chosen creature gain 10 temporary hit points and can move up to their speed.

legendary.name: Action 2: Hellish Transport
entries: Varrox and each ally within 60 feet of him can teleport up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space they can see.

legendary.name: Action 3: I Am Fire and Death
entries: Each enemy within 20 feet of Varrox must make a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw, taking 11 ({@damage 2d10}) fire damage plus 11 ({@damage 2d10}) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. After the explosion, a shroud of black flame covers Varrox for 1 minute. For the duration, each time another creature hits Varrox with an attack while within 5 feet of him or touches him, that creature takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) fire damage plus 5 ({@damage 1d10}) necrotic damage.

hp.special: Seven times their level (number of d8 Hit Dice equal to their level)

action.name: Signature Attack (Flame Touch)
entries: {@atk ms,rs} {@hit 3 plus PB} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 60 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d10}) fire damage. A flammable object hit by this spell ignites if it isn't being worn or carried. This spell's damage increases by {@damage 1d10} when the tactician reaches 5th level ({@damage 2d10}), 11th level ({@damage 3d10}), and 17th level ({@damage 4d10}).

action.name: 3rd Level: Heat Seeker (3/Day)
entries: As an action, the tactician makes a signature attack but doesn't make an attack roll for it. Instead, the attack automatically hits, and each ally within 30 feet of the target can use their reaction to move up to their speed toward the target.

action.name: 5th Level: Beacon (3/Day)
entries: When the tactician hits with a signature attack, each creature within 5 feet of the target can use a reaction to make a melee weapon attack against the target.

action.name: 7th Level: Explosion (1/Day)
entries: As an action, the tactician hurls a ball of fire at a point they can see within 120 feet of them. The ball explodes in a 20-foot-radius sphere, forcing each enemy in that area to make a {@dc 10 plus PB} Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes {@damage PBd12} fire damage and is pushed 20 feet away from the center of the area. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and isn't pushed. The fire spreads around corners and ignites flammable objects in the area that aren't being worn or carried.

trait.name: Empower Patron
entries: A non-minion creature serves as the mage's patron in exchange for the mage's protective magic. At the start of the patron's turn, the patron gains temporary hit points equal to twice the number of apprentice mages within 60 feet of them who chose them as a patron and can see them.

trait.name: Exploit Weakness
entries: When the mage makes or joins an attack that's made with advantage, the attack deals an extra 1 damage per mage who made or joined the attack.

trait.name: Minion
entries: If the mage takes damage from an attack or as the result of a failed saving throw, their hit points are reduced to 0. If the mage takes damage from another effect, they die if the damage equals or exceeds their hit point maximum; otherwise they take no damage.

action.name: Lightning Strike (Group Attack)
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 5} to hit, range 120 ft., one creature. {@h}2 lightning damage, and if this attack was made by more than one mage, each mage who joined the attack picks one creature within 30 feet of the original target. Each creature picked takes 2 lightning damage for each mage who targeted them; the mage's Exploit Weakness trait does not increase this damage.

action.name: Thunder Crack (Group Attack)
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 thunder damage, and the target can't make opportunity attacks until the start of their next turn.

trait.name: Exploit Opening (3/Day)
entries: When the brawler makes an attack, they have advantage on the attack roll.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The brawler makes two attacks using Grab, Haymaker, or both.

action.name: Grab
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one Medium or smaller creature. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) bludgeoning damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 13}). Until this grapple ends, the brawler can't grab another creature.

action.name: Haymaker
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) bludgeoning damage, or 10 ({@damage 3d4 + 3}) bludgeoning damage against a {@condition grappled} target.

action.name: Throw
entries: The brawler throws one Medium or smaller creature they are grappling or object they are holding up to 30 feet horizontally. If the thrown target is a creature, they fall {@condition prone} after this throw. If the thrown target would enter the space of a creature or solid object that is no more than one size smaller than it, the thrown target collides with it and stops in the nearest unoccupied space, taking 3 ({@damage 1d6}) bludgeoning damage for every 10 feet it was thrown. A Large or smaller creature hit by this thrown target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw or take the same amount of damage and fall {@condition prone}.

reaction.name: Meat Shield
entries: When the brawler is grappling a target and is hit by a ranged attack made by another creature the brawler can see, the brawler gains a +2 bonus to AC against the triggering attack. If this bonus causes the attack to miss the brawler, it hits the {@condition grappled} target instead.

trait.name: Death Chant
entries: When an enemy succeeds on a death saving throw while within 30 feet of three or more acolytes who aren't {@condition incapacitated}, the success instead counts as a failure, and if the roll was a 20, the enemy doesn't regain hit points.

trait.name: Exploit Weakness
entries: When the acolyte makes or joins an attack that's made with advantage, the attack deals an extra 1 damage per acolyte who made or joined the attack.

trait.name: Minion
entries: If the acolyte takes damage from an attack or as the result of a failed saving throw, their hit points are reduced to 0. If the acolyte takes damage from another effect, they die if the damage equals or exceeds their hit point maximum; otherwise they take no damage.

action.name: Transfer Life (Group Attack)
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}2 necrotic damage, and if this attack was made by more than one acolyte, a creature of the acolytes' choice within 30 feet of them regains 1 hit point per acolyte who joined this group attack.

action.name: Necrotic Bolt (Group Attack)
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 4} to hit, range 30 ft., one target. {@h}2 necrotic damage.

trait.name: Exploit Opening (3/Day)
entries: When the cultist makes an attack, they have advantage on the attack roll.

action.name: Scythe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) slashing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) necrotic damage, and the cultist regains hit points equal to half the necrotic damage dealt.

action.name: Death Bolt
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 6} to hit, range 60 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 4d6}) necrotic damage, and the target's weapon attacks deal half damage until the start of the cultist's next turn.

action.name: Blackfire Blessing (1/Day)
entries: The cultist empowers up to 10 non-minion allies within 30 feet of them. For 1 minute or until the cultist dies, each creature's weapons burn with black fire and deal an extra 2 ({@damage 1d4}) necrotic damage on a hit.

bonus.name: Rise, My Minions! (1/Day)
entries: The cultist chooses up to three creatures within 30 feet of them who died within the last minute. These creatures return to life with 1 hit point, but they can't regain hit points, and they die after 1 minute.

reaction.name: Life from Death
entries: When a creature the cultist can see within 30 feet of them fails a death saving throw or dies, the cultist siphons their faltering life energy. The cultist chooses a creature within 30 feet of the cultist who isn't {@condition unconscious}, and that creature regains 14 ({@damage 4d6}) hit points.

trait.name: Exploit Weakness
entries: When the guard makes or joins an attack that's made with advantage, the attack deals an extra 1 damage per guard who made or joined the attack.

trait.name: Minion
entries: If the guard takes damage from an attack or as the result of a failed saving throw, their hit points are reduced to 0. If the guard takes damage from another effect, they die if the damage equals or exceeds their hit point maximum; otherwise they take no damage.

trait.name: Overwhelm
entries: If a Medium or smaller enemy starts their turn within 5 feet of three or more guards who can see them, until the start of the enemy's next turn, the enemy's speed is reduced by 5 feet for each guard within 5 feet of them. If this reduces the enemy's walking speed to 0, they are {@condition restrained} until the start of their next turn.

action.name: Spear (Group Attack)
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}1 piercing damage.

trait.name: Exploit Opening (3/Day)
entries: When the knave makes an attack, they have advantage on the attack roll.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The knave makes two Morningstar or two Javelin attacks. They can replace one attack with a Shield Bash attack.

action.name: Morningstar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) piercing damage, or 13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) piercing damage if the target is {@condition prone}.

action.name: Shield Bash
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) bludgeoning damage, and if the target is a Medium or smaller creature, they must succeed on a {@dc 14} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Javelin
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) piercing damage.

bonus.name: Stay Down
entries: The knave kicks one {@condition prone} creature within 5 feet of them. The target must succeed on a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw or their speed is reduced to 0 until the end of their next turn.

trait.name: Charge
entries: If the raider moves at least 15 feet straight toward a target and then hits the target with a melee attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 3 ({@damage 1d6}) damage.

trait.name: Exploit Opening (3/Day)
entries: When the raider makes an attack, they have advantage on the attack roll.

action.name: Handaxe
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) slashing damage.

action.name: Shield Shove
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) bludgeoning damage, and if the target is a Medium or smaller creature, they must succeed on a {@dc 12} Strength saving throw or be pushed 5 feet away from the raider.

reaction.name: Splinter Shield
entries: When the raider is wielding a shield and is hit by an attack made by a creature they can see, the raider gains a +4 bonus to AC against the triggering attack. If this causes the attack to miss, the raider's shield breaks, and until they get a new shield, their AC is reduced by 2 and they can't use this reaction or make a Shield Shove attack.

trait.name: Ambusher
entries: In the first round of combat, the scoundrel has advantage on attack rolls against any surprised creature.

trait.name: Exploit Opening (3/Day)
entries: When the scoundrel makes an attack, they have advantage on the attack roll.

trait.name: Hit 'Em Where It Hurts
entries: When the scoundrel has advantage on a weapon attack roll, the attack deals an extra 7 ({@damage 2d6}) damage on a hit.

action.name: Rapier
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage, and the scoundrel can make a dagger attack against the target with advantage.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) piercing damage.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting (Utility)
headerEntries: In addition to any other spells in this stat block, the wizard can cast the following spells, using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 15}):

trait.name: Exploit Opening (3/Day)
entries: When the wizard makes an attack, they have advantage on the attack roll.

action.name: Arcane Staff
entries: {@atk ms,rs} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30 ft., one target. {@h}21 ({@damage 6d6}) lightning damage.

action.name: Gust of Wind (1/Day; 2nd-Level Spell; Concentration)
entries: A 10-foot-wide, 60-foot-long line of strong wind gusts from the wizard for 1 minute. Each creature who starts their turn in that area must succeed on a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw or be pushed 15 feet away from the wizard. Each creature in that area must spend 2 feet of movement for every 1 foot they move toward the wizard.

The gust disperses gas or vapor, and it extinguishes candles, torches, and similar unprotected flames. It has a 50 percent chance to extinguish protected flames like lanterns. The wizard can use a bonus action to change the direction in which the wind blasts from them.

action.name: Lightning Bolt (3/Day; 3rd-Level Spell)
