entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d12 + 3}) slashing damage, or 12 ({@damage 1d12 + 6}) slashing damage if the target is {@condition prone}. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, they must succeed on a {@dc 13} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Javelin
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage.

bonus.name: Healing Rally (1/Day)
entries: The fury regains 5 hit points.

trait.name: Relentless (1/Turn)
entries: When the garroter isn't {@condition incapacitated} and they are reduced to 0 hit points but not killed outright, they can make an attack against an enemy (no action required) before the hit point reduction is resolved. If the attack hits and its damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the garroter drops to 1 hit point instead of 0 hit points.

action.name: Strangle
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) bludgeoning damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 12}). Until the grapple ends, the target can't speak intelligibly or cast spells with verbal components. If the attack was made with advantage, the target must make a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target falls {@condition unconscious} for 1 minute (save ends at start of turn) or until they take damage. A creature can use an action to shake another creature awake who falls {@condition unconscious} in this way.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage. If the attack was made with advantage, the target takes an extra 7 ({@damage 2d6}) piercing damage.

bonus.name: Cloak (1/Day)
entries: The garroter magically turns {@condition invisible} for 1 minute. Any equipment the garroter wears or carries is {@condition invisible} with them. While {@condition invisible}, the garroter's movements make no sound. If the garroter hits a creature with an attack, casts a spell, or takes damage, the effect ends.

trait.name: Relentless (1/Turn)
entries: When the godcaller isn't {@condition incapacitated} and they are reduced to 0 hit points but not killed outright, they can make an attack against an enemy (no action required) before the hit point reduction is resolved. If the attack hits and its damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the godcaller drops to 1 hit point instead of 0 hit points.

action.name: Power Chord (1st-Level Spell)
entries: {@atk ms,rs} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30 ft., one creature who can hear the godcaller. {@h}18 ({@damage 4d6 + 4}) thunder damage.

action.name: Cadenza
entries: The godcaller chooses another creature within 30 feet of them. If the target can hear the godcaller, the target can use their reaction to move up to their speed and make an attack.

action.name: Song of the Gods (2nd-Level Spell)
entries: The godcaller and each ally within 30 feet of them who can hear them has advantage on attack rolls until the start of the godcaller's next turn. This effect ends early if the godcaller takes any damage.

bonus.name: Rallying Ostinato (1/Day)
entries: The godcaller and up to three allies within 60 feet of them who can hear them regain 20 hit points, and these creatures ignore difficult terrain for 1 minute.

trait.name: Relentless (1/Turn)
entries: When the rampart isn't {@condition incapacitated} and they are reduced to 0 hit points but not killed outright, they can make an attack against an enemy (no action required) before the hit point reduction is resolved. If the attack hits and its damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the rampart drops to 1 hit point instead of 0 hit points.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The rampart makes two Spear attacks. If the rampart targets the same creature with both attacks, the target has disadvantage on attack rolls against creatures other than the rampart until the start of the rampart's next turn.

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) piercing damage, or 8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

reaction.name: No!
entries: When an enemy within 5 feet of the rampart targets another creature with an attack, the attacker must target the rampart instead.

trait.name: Relentless (1/Turn)
entries: When the terranova isn't {@condition incapacitated} and they are reduced to 0 hit points but not killed outright, they can make an attack against an enemy (no action required) before the hit point reduction is resolved. If the attack hits and its damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the terranova drops to 1 hit point instead of 0 hit points.

trait.name: Tremorspeak
entries: The terranova can sense anything a willing creature within 30 feet of them can sense with tremorsense or Tremorspeak.

trait.name: Unhindered
entries: The terranova ignores difficult terrain.

action.name: Earth Pillar (1st-Level Spell)
entries: {@atk ms,rs} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30 ft., one target touching the ground. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d8 + 3}) bludgeoning damage, and the target is knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Quake
entries: The terranova chooses up to five creatures on the ground within 15 feet of them and stomps the ground. Each target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Sinkhole
entries: The terranova chooses up to two creatures on the ground within 30 feet of them. Each target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Strength saving throw or be {@condition restrained}. A creature can use their action to free themself or another creature within their reach, ending the effect on that creature.

bonus.name: Rush
entries: The terranova takes the Dash action.

bonus.name: Unearth Mohlers (1/Day)
entries: The terranova stomps, and {@dice 1d3 + 1} {@creature mohler|FleeMortals}s pop out of the ground in unoccupied spaces within 30 feet of them. The mohlers are friendly to the terranova and act immediately after the terranova's turn on the same initiative count.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) slashing damage.

action.name: Earth Bump
entries: As the mohler burrows under a Large or smaller creature on the ground within 5 feet of them, the mohler shifts the ground. The creature above them must succeed on a {@dc 12} Dexterity saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Ground Grinder
entries: The mohler burrows up to their burrowing speed. Ground within 5 feet of where the mohler burrows becomes difficult terrain.

reaction.name: Zip
entries: If the mohler fails a Dexterity saving throw while burrowing, they succeed instead.

trait.name: Siege Monster
entries: The scyza deals double damage to objects and structures.

trait.name: War Harness
entries: While wearing a war harness, the scyza can carry up to thirty-six Medium or smaller creatures.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The scyza makes two Claw attacks.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) slashing damage, and the target is knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Tail Whip
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is on top of the scyza, the target falls off and lands {@condition prone}.

action.name: Head Crest
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}23 ({@damage 4d8 + 5}) bludgeoning damage, and if the target is a creature who can hear, they are {@condition dazed|FleeMortals} until the end of their next turn by the crest's deep ringing.

action.name: Claw Twister {@recharge}
entries: The scyza claws at the ground in a flurry. Each creature of the scyza's choice within 5 feet of them must make a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 13 ({@damage 3d8}) slashing damage, is knocked {@condition prone}, and is {@condition blinded} by a cloud of dust until the start of the scyza's next turn. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and isn't knocked {@condition prone} or {@condition blinded}.

monster.name: Dohma Raskovar

trait.name: Adrenaline Rush
entries: If Raskovar fails a saving throw, he can expend a use of his Dohma Rally without gaining its benefits (no action required) and succeed instead.

trait.name: Relentless (1/Turn)
entries: When Raskovar isn't {@condition incapacitated} and he is reduced to 0 hit points but not killed outright, he can make an attack against an enemy (no action required) before the hit point reduction is resolved. If the attack hits and its damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, Raskovar drops to 1 hit point instead of 0 hit points.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Raskovar makes three Repeating Crossbow attacks or two War Mace attacks.

action.name: War Mace
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 2d4 + 3}) bludgeoning damage, and the target is {@condition dazed|FleeMortals} until the end of their next turn.

action.name: Repeating Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d12 + 1}) piercing damage, and the target's speed is reduced by 10 feet until the end of their next turn.

action.name: Reinforcements (1/Day)
entries: Raskovar takes the Dodge action, and ten orc blitzers appear in unoccupied spaces within 30 feet of him.

bonus.name: Dohma Rally (3/Day)
entries: Raskovar regains 20 hit points, and he gains resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage until the end of his next turn.

reaction.name: On the House
entries: When a creature Raskovar can see within 30 feet of him fails an ability check or misses with an attack roll, that creature can reroll the check or attack, choosing either result.

legendaryHeader: Raskovar has three villain actions. He can take each action once during an encounter after an enemy's turn. He can take these actions in any order but can use only one per round.

legendary.name: Action 1: Close In
entries: Each ally within 60 feet of Raskovar who can hear him can move up to their speed. After this movement, each enemy within 5 feet of at least one creature who moved must make a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} of Raskovar for 1 minute (save ends at end of turn).

legendary.name: Action 2: Lockdown
entries: Each ally within 60 feet of Raskovar who can hear him can make a Strength ({@skill Athletics}) check with advantage to grapple an enemy within their reach (no action required). Then Raskovar can move up to his speed.

legendary.name: Action 3: Do It Myself
entries: Raskovar moves up to his speed without provoking opportunity attacks. At the end of the movement, he can make up to five War Mace attacks with advantage.

hp.special: Eight times their level (number of d10 Hit Dice equal to their level)

action.name: Signature Attack (Warhammer)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3 plus PB} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 1d10 plus PB} bludgeoning damage. Beginning at 7th level, the blacksmith can make this attack twice, instead of once, when they take the Attack action on their turn.

action.name: 3rd Level: Relentless Rush (3/Day)
entries: When the blacksmith isn't {@condition incapacitated} and they take damage but aren't killed outright, they can make an attack against an enemy (no action required) before the hit point reduction is resolved. If the attack hits, the blacksmith regains twice their PB hit points.

action.name: 5th Level: Reinforce Armor (3/Day)
entries: As a bonus action, the blacksmith touches a piece of armor and fortifies it. For the next 10 minutes, a creature wearing the armor gains a bonus to their AC equal to half the blacksmith's PB.

action.name: 7th Level: Fortify Weapon (3/Day)
entries: As a bonus action, the blacksmith touches a weapon and polishes it. For 1 minute, the weapon is magical and deals an extra {@damage 0d1 + PB|PB} damage.

hp.special: 7 + seven times caregiver's level (number of d8 Hit Dice equal to their caregiver's level)

action.name: Signature Attack (Claw)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3 plus PB} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 1d6 plus PB} slashing damage.

action.name: 1st Level: Earth Bump (2 Ferocity)
entries: The mohler burrows up to their speed and chooses one Large or smaller creature they come within 5 feet of during the move. The target must succeed on a {@dc 10 plus PB} Dexterity saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: 3rd Level: Sinkhole (5 Ferocity)
entries: The mohler burrows up to their speed and targets a creature they can sense on the surface within 10 feet of them. The target must succeed on a {@dc 10 plus PB} Strength saving throw or be {@condition restrained} by the ground until the start of the mohler's next turn.

action.name: 5th Level: Terranova (8 Ferocity)
entries: Each creature on the ground within 10 feet of the mohler must succeed on a {@dc 10 plus PB} Strength saving throw or take {@damage 1d6 plus PB} bludgeoning damage and be knocked {@condition prone}. A creature who fails this saving throw by 5 or more is {@condition restrained} by the ground (save ends at end of turn). A creature can use their action to free themself or another creature within their reach, ending the effect.

reaction.name: Quick Pit (Recharges after a Long Rest)
entries: If the mohler's caregiver fails a Dexterity saving throw while they are within 10 feet of the mohler and the mohler isn't {@condition incapacitated} or {@condition restrained}, the mohler pulls the caregiver out of danger. The caregiver succeeds on the saving throw instead.

trait.name: Adjustable Appendages
entries: The otyugh has seven adjustable appendages, which they can convert into other appendages using their Transform bonus action. In their natural state, the otyugh has one eyestalk, three legs, and three tentacles. These appendages grant the following benefits:

items: {@b Eyestalks.} The otyugh's first eyestalk gives them darkvision out to a range of 60 feet and immunity to the {@condition dazed|FleeMortals} condition, and each additional eyestalk increases their darkvision's range by 60 feet. If the otyugh has no eyestalks, they are {@condition blinded} and lose immunity to the {@condition flanked|FleeMortals} condition.
{@b Legs.} Each leg gives the otyugh a cumulative walking speed of 15 feet.
{@b Tentacles.} The otyugh's number of tentacles determine how many attacks they can make with Multiattack and how many creatures they can grapple with Tentacle Slam.

trait.name: Limited Telepathy
entries: The otyugh can magically transmit simple messages and images to any creature within 120 feet of them that can understand a language. This form of telepathy doesn't allow the receiving creature to telepathically respond.

trait.name: Rot Leech
entries: At the start of each of the otyugh's turns, each creature {@condition grappled} by the otyugh has their hit point maximum reduced by 5 ({@damage 1d10}) for 1 hour. The otyugh regains the same number of hit points. This effect can't reduce a creature's hit point maximum below their current hit points.

trait.name: Trash Traversal
entries: The otyugh ignores difficult terrain. They also have advantage on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) checks made to hide in piles of refuse.

trait.name: Vile Stench
entries: A creature who starts their turn within 10 feet of the otyugh must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} until the start of the creature's next turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The otyugh makes one Tentacle Slam attack for each tentacle they currently have (see Adjustable Appendages).

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}21 ({@damage 4d8 + 3}) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or be diseased with otyuck. A creature with otyuck can't take the Dash action and their speed is halved.

action.name: Tentacle Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) bludgeoning damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) piercing damage. If the target is Medium or smaller, they are {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 13}) and {@condition restrained} until the grapple ends. The otyugh can grapple one target for each tentacle they currently have.

bonus.name: Transform
entries: The otyugh converts one of their Adjustable Appendages into an eyestalk, leg, or tentacle.

trait.name: Minion
entries: If the dregsbelcher takes damage from an attack or as the result of a failed saving throw, their hit points are reduced to 0. If the dregsbelcher takes damage from another effect, they die if the damage equals or exceeds their hit point maximum; otherwise they take no damage.

trait.name: Trash Traversal
entries: The dregsbelcher ignores difficult terrain. They also have advantage on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) checks made to hide in piles of refuse.

trait.name: Whetted Appetites
entries: While within 60 feet of the dregsbelcher, each friendly non-minion otyugh gains a +1 bonus to attack rolls. This bonus increases by 1 (to a maximum of +5) for each dregsbelcher in range of that creature.

action.name: Regurgitate (Group Attack)
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/40 ft., one target. {@h}2 bludgeoning damage plus 2 acid damage.

hp.special: 7 + seven times caregiver's level (number of d8 Hit Dice equal to their caregiver's level)

trait.name: Trash Traversal
entries: The otyugh ignores difficult terrain. They have advantage on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) checks made to hide in piles of refuse.

action.name: Signature Attack (Bite)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3 plus PB} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 1d6 plus PB} piercing damage.

action.name: 1st Level: Tentacle Slam (2 Ferocity)
entries: The otyugh makes a signature attack. On a hit, the target must also succeed on a {@dc 10 plus PB} Strength saving throw or be {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 10 plus PB}). The otyugh can only grapple one target at a time.

action.name: 3rd Level: Brutal Charge (5 Ferocity)
entries: The otyugh moves up to their speed without provoking opportunity attacks. During or after this move, they can make a signature attack against one target.

action.name: 5th Level: Retch (8 Ferocity)
entries: The otyugh regurgitates garbage in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 10 plus PB} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes {@damage PBd6} poison damage and is {@condition poisoned}. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and isn't {@condition poisoned}.

bonus.name: Slough Rot (Recharges after a Long Rest)
entries: The otyugh touches their caregiver and ends one disease or one of the following conditions affecting the caregiver: {@condition blinded}, {@condition dazed|FleeMortals}, {@condition deafened}, {@condition paralyzed}, or {@condition poisoned}.

trait.name: Detached Eyes
entries: Six eyes float around the overmind and create their Eye Psionics effects. Each eye is an object that has AC 24, 1 hit point, and a psionic shield that makes it immune to damage. After an eye creates a psionic effect, it loses its psionic shield until the start of the overmind's next turn. If an eye is destroyed, a new eye pops out of the overmind's face to replace it at the end of their next turn.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 4d6}) piercing damage.

action.name: Eye Psionics
entries: The overmind creates three of the following psionic eye effects. Unless otherwise stated, each eye targets a creature who the overmind can see within 120 feet of them. They can't use the same effect twice in a turn.

items.name: 1. Charm Beam
entries: The targeted creature must succeed on a {@dc 16} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition charmed} by the overmind for 1 hour, or until the overmind harms the creature or one of their allies.

items.name: 2. Compulsion Beam
entries: The targeted creature must succeed on a {@dc 16} Intelligence saving throw or use their reaction, if available, to move up to their speed toward the closest ally they can see and make a weapon attack against them. Creatures who can't be {@condition charmed} are unaffected.

items.name: 3. Toxic Vapors
entries: The overmind chooses a point they can see within 120 feet of them. Each creature within 10 feet of the point must succeed on a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute (save ends at end of turn).

items.name: 4. Telekinetic Beam
entries: The targeted creature must succeed on a {@dc 16} Strength saving throw or be moved up to 30 feet in any direction and take 7 ({@damage 2d6}) force damage at the end of the move. Alternatively, the overmind can target an object they can see within 120 feet of them that weighs 300 pounds or less and isn't being worn or carried, moving it up to 30 feet in any direction. The overmind can also exert fine control on objects with this effect, such as manipulating a simple tool or opening a door or a container.

items.name: 5. Lightning Bolt
entries: The overmind shoots a 5-foot-wide, 60-foot-long line of lightning. Each creature in the line must succeed on a {@dc 16} Dexterity saving throw, taking 21 ({@damage 6d6}) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

items.name: 6. Fire Beam
entries: The targeted creature must make a {@dc 16} Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes 36 ({@damage 8d8}) fire damage and catches fire, taking 9 ({@damage 2d8}) fire damage at the start of each of their turns for 1 minute (save ends at end of turn). Any creature can use their action to douse the fire, ending the effect early.

bonus.name: The Great Eye {@recharge}
entries: The overmind's central eye turns solid black and projects a 150-foot cone of energy. If the overmind or any creature in that area is affected by a spell, the spell's effects immediately end for that creature.

reaction.name: Away with You!
entries: When a creature within 5 feet of the overmind hits them with a melee attack, the overmind can use Telekinetic Beam on the attacker.

monster.name: Xorannox

trait.name: Painful Resistance (3/Day)
entries: Eight eyes float around Xorannox and create his Eye Psionics. If Xorannox fails a saving throw, he can destroy a random floating eye (chosen by rolling a {@dice d8}) and succeed instead. If an eye is destroyed, a new eye pops of out of Xorannox's face to replace it 24 hours later.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 4d6}) piercing damage.

action.name: Eye Psionics
entries: Xorannox creates three of the following psionic eye effects. Unless otherwise stated, each eye targets a creature who he can see within 120 feet of him. He can't use the same effect twice on a turn.

items.name: 1. Charm Beam
entries: The targeted creature must succeed on a {@dc 17} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition charmed} by Xorannox for 1 hour, or until he harms the creature or one of their allies.

items.name: 2. Compulsion Beam
entries: The targeted creature must succeed on a {@dc 17} Intelligence saving throw or use their reaction, if available, to move up to their speed toward the closest ally they can see and make one weapon attack against them. Creatures who can't be {@condition charmed} are unaffected.

items.name: 3. Memory Beam
entries: The targeted creature must make a {@dc 17} Intelligence saving throw. On a failed save, if the creature has unexpended spell slots, they expend a spell slot of their highest remaining level, with no effect. If they don't have unexpended spell slots, they instead lose proficiency with a weapon they're holding or carrying for 1 minute (save ends at end of turn).

items.name: 4. Toxic Vapors
entries: Xorannox chooses a point he can see within 120 feet of him. Each creature within 10 feet of the point must succeed on a {@dc 17} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute (save ends at end of turn).

items.name: 5. Telekinetic Field
entries: Xorannox chooses a point he can see within 120 feet of him. Each enemy within 10 feet of the point must succeed on a {@dc 17} Strength saving throw or be moved up to 30 feet in any direction and take 7 ({@damage 2d6}) force damage at the end of the move. Additionally, Xorannox can target any object within 10 feet of the point that weighs 300 pounds or less and isn't being worn or carried, moving it up to 30 feet in any direction. Xorannox can also exert fine control on objects with this effect, such as manipulating a simple tool or opening a door or a container.

items.name: 6. Lightning Bolt
entries: Xorannox shoots a 5-foot-wide, 60-foot-long line of lightning. Each creature in the line must succeed on a {@dc 17} Dexterity saving throw, taking 36 ({@damage 8d8}) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

items.name: 7. Explosion
entries: Xorannox chooses a point he can see within 120 feet of him. Each creature within 10 feet of the point must make a {@dc 17} Dexterity saving throw, taking 36 ({@damage 8d8}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

items.name: 8. Necrosis Beam
entries: The targeted creature must succeed on a {@dc 17} Constitution saving throw or immediately take 55 ({@damage 10d10}) necrotic damage and lose 7 ({@damage 2d6}) hit points at the start of each of their turns. If this effect reduces a target's hit points to 0, they die. The effect ends if Xorannox dies or can't see the target. This psionic effect can't be used again while this effect persists.

bonus.name: The Great Eye {@recharge}
entries: Xorannox's central eye turns solid black and projects a 150-foot cone of energy. If Xorannox or any creature in that area is affected by a spell, the spell's effects immediately end for that creature.

reaction.name: Cower!
entries: When a creature hits Xorannox with an attack, he shoots a psionic fear beam at them. The creature must succeed on a {@dc 17} Wisdom saving throw or take 21 ({@damage 6d6}) psychic damage and be {@condition frightened} of Xorannox for 1 minute (save ends at end of turn).

legendaryHeader: Xorannox has three villain actions. He can take each action once during an encounter after an enemy's turn. He can take these actions in any order but can use only one per round.

legendary.name: Action 1: Disruption Beams
entries: Xorannox shoots a psionic disruption beam at three creatures he can see within 120 feet of him. Each target must make a {@dc 17} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, whenever the target makes more than one weapon attack on a turn or casts a spell that isn't a cantrip, they take 14 ({@damage 4d6}) psychic damage. This effect lasts for 1 minute (save ends at end of turn).

legendary.name: Action 2: Disappearing Act
entries: Xorannox turns {@condition invisible} until the end of his next turn and teleports up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space he can see.

legendary.name: Action 3: Megabeam
entries: Xorannox unleashes the effects of all of his remaining psionic eyes at once in a 20-foot-wide, 120-foot-long line. Each creature in that area must make a save against two random eye effects from Xorannox's Eye

legendary.name: Psionics (reroll duplicates for each target)
entries: If the effect usually affects an area, it instead only affects individual creatures.

trait.name: Deadly Leap
entries: The owlbear's long jump is up to 30 feet and their high jump is 15 feet, with or without a running start. If the owlbear leaps at least 20 feet toward a target and then hits them with a Bite or Claw attack, the target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Keen Sight and Smell
entries: The owlbear has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight or smell.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The owlbear makes one Bite and one Claw attack.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 1d12 + 5}) piercing damage, and the owlbear can move the target 5 feet in any direction.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) slashing damage.

action.name: Bear Hug {@recharge 4}
entries: The owlbear attempts to grab and crush a creature they can see within 5 feet of them. The target must make a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes 22 ({@damage 4d10}) bludgeoning damage and is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 15}). On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage and is not {@condition grappled}. Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained} and takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) bludgeoning damage at the start of each of their turns. The grapple ends if the owlbear uses Bear Hug on another target or makes a Claw attack against another target.

reaction.name: Hulking Rush
entries: When the owlbear takes damage, they can move up to half their speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

hp.special: 7 + seven times caregiver's level (number of d8 Hit Dice equal to their caregiver's level)

trait.name: Keen Sight and Smell
entries: The owlbear has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight or smell.

action.name: Signature Attack (Claw)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3 plus PB} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 1d6 plus PB} slashing damage.

action.name: 1st Level: Violent Attack (2 Ferocity)
entries: The owlbear makes a signature attack. On a hit, the attack deals an extra {@damage 0d1 + PB|PB} damage, and the owlbear can move the target 5 feet in any direction.

action.name: 3rd Level: Owlie Oop (5 Ferocity)
entries: The owlbear leaps up to half their speed without provoking opportunity attacks. When they land, each creature within 5 feet of them must succeed on a {@dc 10 plus PB} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: 5th Level: Bear Hug (8 Ferocity)
entries: The owlbear attempts to grab and crush a creature they can see within 5 feet of them. The target must make a {@dc 10 plus PB} Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes {@damage PBd10} bludgeoning damage and is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 10 plus PB}). On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage and is not {@condition grappled}. Until this grapple ends, the target is also {@condition restrained}. The grapple ends if the owlbear uses Bear Hug on another target or makes a signature attack against another target.

bonus.name: Give a Hoot (Recharges after a Long Rest)
entries: The owlbear lets loose a unique battle hoot. If the owlbear's caregiver can hear the owlbear, the caregiver gains 5 × PB temporary hit points.

trait.name: Engulfing Sack
entries: The mound has a vegetative sack on their body where they carry engulfed creatures. The sack can be attacked (AC 15; 50 hit points; immunity to poison and psychic damage), which deals no damage to the mound. Destroying the sack frees creatures trapped by the mound's Engulf action. The mound regrows the sack at the beginning of their next turn.

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: While the mound remains motionless, they are indistinguishable from an ordinary mass of vegetation.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The mound makes two Vine Lash attacks. They can replace one attack with a use of Engulf, if available.

action.name: Vine Lash
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 60 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) piercing damage. If the target is Medium or smaller, the mound can pull the target up to 30 feet toward them.

action.name: Engulf {@recharge 5}
entries: The mound reaches out with writhing vines and attempts to pull in up to two Medium or smaller creatures within 30 feet of them. Each target must succeed on a {@dc 16} Strength saving throw or be engulfed in the mound's engulfing sack. An engulfed creature is {@condition restrained}, has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the mound, and takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) poison damage at the start of each of the mound's turns. When the mound moves, the engulfed creature moves with them. If the mound dies or their engulfing sack is destroyed, each engulfed creature is freed and shunted to an unoccupied space of their choice within 5 feet of the mound.

reaction.name: Poison Froth
entries: When the mound takes damage, the inside of their engulfing sack churns with poison. Each creature engulfed by the mound takes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) poison damage, and the mound regains a number of hit points equal to the total damage dealt by this reaction to creatures in their sack.

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: While the pile remains motionless, they are indistinguishable from an ordinary mass of vegetation.

trait.name: Hungry Grab
entries: If an enemy starts their turn within 5 feet of three or more piles, the creature must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or be {@condition grappled}. While {@condition grappled} in this way, the target is {@condition restrained}, and at the start of each of the target's turns, they take poison damage equal to the number of piles within 5 feet of them. The saving throw and escape DC equal 10 plus the number of piles within 5 feet of the creature. The grapple ends if fewer than three piles are within 5 feet of the creature.

trait.name: Minion
entries: If the pile takes damage from an attack or as the result of a failed saving throw, their hit points are reduced to 0. If the pile takes damage from another effect, they die if the damage equals or exceeds their hit point maximum; otherwise they take no damage.

action.name: Vine Lash (Group Attack)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 piercing damage.

hp.special: 7 + seven times caregiver's level (number of d8 Hit Dice equal to their caregiver's level)

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: While the mound remains motionless, they are indistinguishable from an ordinary mass of vegetation. If the mound's caregiver is Large or smaller, they can use the Hide action to attempt to hide in the same space as their motionless mound.

action.name: Signature Attack (Vine Lash)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3 plus PB} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 1d6 plus PB} piercing damage.

action.name: 1st Level: Long-Range Lash (2 Ferocity)
entries: The mound makes a signature attack with a reach of 30 feet instead of 5 feet.
If this attack hits a Medium or smaller creature, the mound can pull the target up to 10 feet toward the mound.

action.name: 3rd Level: Verdant Roundup (5 Ferocity)
entries: The mound targets up to PB creatures within 30 feet of them who are Large or smaller. Each target must succeed on a {@dc 10 plus PB} Dexterity saving throw or be pulled up to 15 feet toward the mound and take {@damage PBd4} poison damage.

action.name: 5th Level: Engulf (8 Ferocity)
entries: The mound attempts to pull a Large or smaller creature within 5 feet of them into their body. The target must make a {@dc 10 plus PB} Strength saving throw. On a failure, the target is pulled into the mound's space, takes {@damage PBd8} poison damage, and is engulfed. On a success, a creature takes half as much damage, doesn't move, and isn't engulfed.

An engulfed creature is {@condition restrained}, has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the mound, and takes {@damage PBd8} poison damage at the start of each of the mound's turns. When the mound moves, the engulfed creature moves with them. An engulfed creature can try to escape by taking an action to make a {@dc 10 plus PB} Strength check. On a success, that creature is freed and shunted to an unoccupied space of their choice within 5 feet of the mound.
The mound can have one Large or up to four Medium or smaller creatures engulfed at a time.

trait.name: Tiny Target
entries: If the stirge is reduced to 0 hit points by any damage other than psychic while attached to another creature, that creature takes damage equal to half that dealt to the stirge.

action.name: Proboscis
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}3 piercing damage, and the stirge can attach to the target and enter their space. While attached, the stirge moves with the target and can't make Proboscis attacks. A creature who can reach the stirge can use an action to detach the stirge, shunting them into the nearest unoccupied space of the stirge's choice. The stirge also detaches if they become {@condition grappled}, {@condition incapacitated}, {@condition prone}, or {@condition restrained}.

action.name: Drain Essence
entries: The stirge sips the life essence of a creature they are attached to who isn't a Construct or an Undead. The creature loses 3 hit points and must succeed on a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} until the end of the stirge's next turn. If the creature is already {@condition poisoned}, they also become {@condition dazed|FleeMortals} until the end of the stirge's next turn.

trait.name: Minion
entries: If the broodling takes damage from an attack or as the result of a failed saving throw, their hit points are reduced to 0. If the broodling takes damage from another effect, they die if the damage equals or exceeds their hit point maximum; otherwise they take no damage.

trait.name: Tiny Target
entries: If the broodling is reduced to 0 hit points by any damage other than psychic while attached to another creature, that creature takes 1 damage of the same type.

action.name: Proboscis (Group Attack)
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}1 piercing damage, and each broodling who joined the attack can attach to the target and enter their space. While attached, a broodling moves with the target and can't make Proboscis attacks. The target or a creature who can reach them can use an action or bonus action to detach all broodlings, shunting them into the nearest unoccupied space of each broodling's choice. The broodling also detaches if they become {@condition grappled}, {@condition incapacitated}, {@condition prone}, or {@condition restrained}.

action.name: Drain Essence
entries: The broodling sips the life essence of a creature they're attached to who isn't a Construct or an Undead. The creature loses 1 hit point.

hp.special: 7 + seven times caregiver's level (number of d8 Hit Dice equal to their caregiver's level)

action.name: Signature Attack (Proboscis)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3 plus PB} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 1d6 plus PB} piercing damage.

action.name: 1st Level: Destabilizing Attack (2 Ferocity)
entries: The stirge makes a signature attack. On a hit, the target also has disadvantage on the next attack they make before the end of their next turn.

action.name: 3rd Level: Quick Drink (5 Ferocity)
entries: The stirge makes a signature attack. On a hit, the target takes an extra {@damage PBd4} piercing damage and is {@condition poisoned} until the end of their next turn.

action.name: 5th Level: Attach (8 Ferocity)
entries: The stirge makes a signature attack against a creature. On a hit, the target takes an extra {@damage PBd6} piercing damage and the stirge attaches to the target and enters their space. While attached, the stirge moves with the target and can't attack any creature other than the target. If the stirge hits the target with an attack while attached, the target takes an extra {@damage PBd6} piercing damage. The stirge can use an action or bonus action to detach and move 5 feet into an unoccupied space without provoking opportunity attacks. The stirge also detaches if they become {@condition grappled}, {@condition incapacitated}, {@condition prone}, or {@condition restrained}, or if they take more than PB × 5 damage in a turn.

bonus.name: Essence Shared (2/Long Rest)
entries: If the stirge's caregiver is within 5 feet of them and the stirge isn't attached to another creature, the stirge pumps life essence into the caregiver's veins. The caregiver regains {@damage 1d6 plus PB} hit points.

trait.name: Minion
entries: If the archon takes damage from an attack or as the result of a failed saving throw, their hit points are reduced to 0. If the archon takes damage from another effect, they die if the damage equals or exceeds their hit point maximum; otherwise they take no damage.

trait.name: Psychic Scar
entries: The archon is immune to any effect that would sense their emotions, read their thoughts, reveal they are lying, or reveal their alignment or location.

action.name: Brutal Flail (Group Attack)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 bludgeoning damage. If two or more archons joined the attack, the target must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or be {@condition dazed|FleeMortals} until the end of their next turn. The DC for this saving throw equals 10 plus the number of archons who joined the attack.

action.name: Blaster (Group Attack)
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} to hit, range 30/90 ft., one target. {@h}3 radiant damage.

trait.name: Psychic Scar
entries: The armiger is immune to any effect that would sense their emotions, read their thoughts, reveal they are lying, or reveal their alignment or location.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The armiger makes two attacks using Blaster, Serrated Saber, or both.

action.name: Serrated Saber
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) slashing damage, and the target has disadvantage on their next attack roll made before the start of the armiger's next turn.

action.name: Blaster
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} to hit, range 30/90 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) radiant damage.

action.name: Concussive Slam (1st-Order Power)
entries: The armiger rains down telekinetic force on a creature they can see within 30 feet of them. The target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Strength saving throw or take 7 ({@damage 3d4}) force damage and be knocked {@condition prone}.

reaction.name: Sickening Sympathy (2nd-Order Power)
entries: When another creature the armiger can see within 30 feet of them is hit with an attack, the armiger floods the attacker's mind with the nauseous pain of their target. The attacker must succeed on a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} until the end of their next turn.

trait.name: Precog Reflexes
entries: The nemesis adds their Intelligence modifier (+4) to initiative rolls and to their AC (included in Armor Class).

trait.name: Psychic Scar
entries: The nemesis is immune to any effect that would sense their emotions, read their thoughts, reveal they are lying, or reveal their alignment or location.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The nemesis makes two Golden Scythe attacks. They can replace one attack with a use of Kinetic Crush or Phase, if available.

action.name: Golden Scythe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) slashing damage plus 13 ({@damage 3d8}) necrotic damage. If this attack reduces a creature who is in an astral body (as with the {@spell astral projection} spell) to 0 hit points, that creature's soul returns to their material body, and then their material body is also reduced to 0 hit points.

action.name: Kinetic Crush (4th-Order Power)
entries: The nemesis attempts to telekinetically grip one creature they can see within 60 feet of them. The target must make a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes 27 ({@damage 6d8}) force damage, and their speed becomes 0 until the start of the nemesis's next turn. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage and their speed isn't reduced.

action.name: Phase (1/Day; 4th-Order Power; Concentration)
entries: For 1 minute, the nemesis can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. The nemesis takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) force damage if they end their turn inside an object. If this power ends while the nemesis is inside an object, they are shunted out of the object into the nearest unoccupied space of their choice.

bonus.name: Jaunt (3/Day; 3rd-Order Power)
entries: The nemesis teleports up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space they can see.

trait.name: Psychic Scar
entries: The vertex is immune to any effect that would sense their emotions, read their thoughts, reveal they are lying, or reveal their alignment or location.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The vertex makes two Psionic Slam attacks.

action.name: Psionic Slam
entries: {@atk mp} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) bludgeoning damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) psychic damage, and the next attack roll against the target made before the start of the vertex's next turn has advantage.

action.name: Split Space (2/Day)
entries: The vertex chooses a point in a precise location they have seen (in person or otherwise) on any plane of existence. A shimmering 10-foot-diameter portal leading to that location appears in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the vertex. Each creature who touches the portal is instantly teleported to the nearest unoccupied space at the chosen location. The portal lasts until the vertex dies, uses this action again, dismisses the portal as an action, or is transported by the portal.

bonus.name: Invigorated March (3rd-Order Power)
entries: The vertex emits invigorating psionic energy. Each time raider within 60 feet of the vertex can use their reaction to move up to half their speed.

reaction.name: Kinetic Defense Field
entries: When another Medium or smaller creature the vertex can see within 120 feet of them takes damage, that damage is reduced by 15.

hp.special: Seven times their level (number of d8 Hit Dice equal to their level)

action.name: Signature Attack (Cutlass)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3 plus PB} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 1d10 plus PB} slashing damage. Beginning at 7th level, the freebooter can make this attack twice, instead of once, when they take the Attack action on their turn.

action.name: 7th Level: Wraithstep (1/Day)
entries: As an action, the freebooter becomes {@condition invisible} for 1 minute. While {@condition invisible}, the freebooter has resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage from mundane attacks, and the freebooter can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. The freebooter takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) force damage if they end their turn inside an object.

bonus.name: 3rd Level: Blip Strike (3/Day)
entries: As a bonus action, the freebooter teleports up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space they can see. If this space is within 5 feet of an enemy the freebooter can see, the freebooter can make a signature attack against them with advantage as part of this bonus action.

bonus.name: 5th Level: Kinetic Clamp (3/Day)
entries: As a bonus action, the freebooter tries to telekinetically grip one creature they can see within 60 feet of them. The target must make a {@dc 10 plus PB} Strength saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes {@damage PBd6} force damage and is {@condition restrained} until the start of the freebooter's next turn. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage and is not {@condition restrained}.

monster.name: Goxomoc
languages: understands all languages but can't speak

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: Goxomoc can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Earthbinder
entries: Enemies within 60 feet of Goxomoc can't fly, and when Goxomoc moves within 60 feet of a flying enemy, the enemy falls.

trait.name: Lightning Lord
entries: If Goxomoc is reduced to 0 hit points, he sheds his flesh form and becomes {@creature Xogomoc|FleeMortals}. Any conditions or other supernatural effects that were affecting Goxomoc continue affecting Xogomoc.

trait.name: Psionic Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If Goxomoc fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead, and he can't use Energy Eyes or Shockwave until the end of his next turn.

trait.name: Psionic Weapons
entries: Goxomoc's weapon attacks are psionic.

trait.name: Siege Monster
entries: Goxomoc deals double damage to objects and structures.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Goxomoc makes one Bite attack, two Claw attacks, and one Stomp attack, and he uses Energy Eyes.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 19} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}36 ({@damage 4d12 + 10}) piercing damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 20}). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained} and Goxomoc can't bite another target. If this damage reduces a creature to 0 hit points, they die and Goxomoc consumes their remains.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 19} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}21 ({@damage 2d10 + 10}) slashing damage, and Goxomoc moves the target up to 10 feet horizontally.

action.name: Stomp
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 19} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target who isn't {@condition grappled} by Goxomoc. {@h}23 ({@damage 2d12 + 10}) bludgeoning damage, and if the target is Huge or smaller, they are knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Energy Eyes (3rd-Order Power)
entries: Goxomoc beams energy from his eyes at a creature he can see within 300 feet of him. The target must make a {@dc 25} Dexterity saving throw, taking 22 ({@damage 4d10}) fire or lightning damage (Goxomoc's choice) on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Catastrophic Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: Goxomoc breathes lightning in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 27} Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 71 ({@damage 11d12}) fire or lightning damage (Goxomoc's choice) and is teleported to an unoccupied space of Goxomoc's choice within that area. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and isn't teleported.

bonus.name: Shockwave (2nd-Order Power)
entries: A psionic shock wave emanates from Goxomoc. Each creature of his choice within 15 feet of him must succeed on a {@dc 25} Strength saving throw or take 22 ({@damage 4d10}) force damage and be pushed up to 20 feet directly away from him.

reaction.name: Volcanic Punishment
entries: When Goxomoc takes damage, he teleports along with any creatures he is grappling in a burst of lava to an unoccupied space he can see within 30 feet of him. Each creature within 10 feet of the space he left must make a {@dc 27} Dexterity saving throw, taking 22 ({@damage 4d10}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

legendaryHeader: Goxomoc has three villain actions. He can take each action once during an encounter after an enemy's turn. He can take these actions in any order but can use only one per round.

legendary.name: Action 1: Rumble
entries: Goxomoc stomps the ground, unleashing a wave of debilitating psionic energy. Mundane objects within 90 feet of Goxomoc that aren't being worn or carried take 55 ({@damage 10d10}) force damage. Creatures within 90 feet of Goxomoc are knocked {@condition prone} and must succeed on a {@dc 27} Dexterity saving throw or be {@condition restrained} and embedded in the ground. A creature can use an action to make a {@dc 20} Strength ({@skill Athletics}) or Dexterity ({@skill Acrobatics}) check, freeing themself or another creature within their reach on a success.

legendary.name: Action 2: Thunder
entries: Goxomoc disappears in a crack of thunder, along with any creatures he is grappling, and reappears in an unoccupied space he can see within 120 feet of him. Each creature within 30 feet of either the space he left or his new space must make a {@dc 27} Constitution saving throw, taking 22 ({@damage 4d10}) thunder damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

legendary.name: Action 3: Eruption
entries: Goxomoc unleashes a psionic scream of anguish in the mind of enemies within 120 feet of him. Each target must make a {@dc 25} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 44 ({@damage 8d10}) psychic damage and then becomes vulnerable to all damage dealt by Goxomoc until the end of his next turn. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and does not become vulnerable to damage.

monster.name: Xogomoc
languages: understands all languages but can't speak

trait.name: Amorphous
entries: Xogomoc can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

trait.name: Discorporation
entries: When Xogomoc drops to 0 hit points or dies, all conditions and other effects end for him. He teleports back to the place where he slumbers, transforms into {@creature Goxomoc|FleeMortals} with all his hit points, and falls {@condition unconscious}.

trait.name: Disruptive Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If Xogomoc fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead, and his Lightning Aura doesn't function until the end of his next turn.

trait.name: Lightning Aura
entries: A creature who starts their turn within 60 feet of Xogomoc must make a {@dc 25} Dexterity saving throw, taking 22 ({@damage 4d10}) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

trait.name: Power of the Storm
entries: Lightning and thunder damage dealt by Xogomoc ignore damage resistance.

trait.name: Siege Monster
entries: Xogomoc deals double damage to objects and structures.

trait.name: Supernatural Resistance
entries: Xogomoc has advantage on saving throws against powers, spells, and other supernatural effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Xogomoc makes two Lightning Strike attacks.

action.name: Lightning Strike
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 19} to hit, reach 15 ft. or range 600 ft., one target. {@h}29 ({@damage 3d12 + 10}) lightning damage, and another target within 30 feet of the first must succeed on a {@dc 27} Dexterity saving throw or take the same damage.

action.name: Energy Flow
entries: Xogomoc moves up to his speed without provoking opportunity attacks. During this move, he can move through the spaces of other creatures, and it doesn't count as difficult terrain. The first time he moves through each creature's space, that creature takes 22 ({@damage 4d10}) lightning damage.

action.name: Lightning Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: Xogomoc breathes lightning in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 27} Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 71 ({@damage 11d12}) lightning damage and can't take reactions until the end of their next turn. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and suffers no other effect.

bonus.name: Gone in a Flash
entries: Xogomoc teleports, along with any creatures inside him (see Into the Storm), up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space he can see. Each creature within 10 feet of the space he left must make a {@dc 25} Constitution saving throw, taking 22 ({@damage 4d10}) thunder damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

reaction.name: Shock Cage
entries: When a creature Xogomoc can see within 30 feet of him hits him with an attack, he encircles the attacker in bands of lightning. The creature takes 22 ({@damage 4d10}) lightning damage and is {@condition restrained} until the end of their next turn.

legendaryHeader: Xogomoc has three villain actions. He can take each action once during an encounter after an enemy's turn. He can take these actions in any order but can use only one per round.

legendary.name: Action 1: Thunderstruck
entries: Xogomoc summons an aweinspiring clap of thunder. Each creature within 120 feet of him who can hear him must succeed on a {@dc 25} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition dazed|FleeMortals} for 1 minute (save ends at end of turn).

legendary.name: Action 2: Into the Storm
entries: Xogomoc summons tempest winds that buffet each enemy he can see within 30 feet of him. Each target must make a {@dc 25} Strength saving throw. On a successful save, a creature takes 16 ({@damage 3d10}) lightning damage. On a failed save, a creature is drawn inside

legendary.name: Xogomoc
entries: While inside Xogomoc, a creature is {@condition restrained}, moves with Xogomoc, has total cover against attacks and other effects outside Xogomoc, and takes 16 ({@damage 3d10}) lightning damage plus 16 ({@damage 3d10}) thunder damage at the start of each of their turns.

A creature inside Xogomoc can use an action to make a {@dc 20} Strength ({@skill Athletics}) or Dexterity ({@skill Acrobatics}) check to move out of Xogomoc, entering an unoccupied space of their choice within 5 feet of Xogomoc on a success. If Xogomoc takes 60 or more damage on a single turn or is reduced to 0 hit points, each creature inside of Xogomoc is shunted out of him into an unoccupied space of their choice within 5 feet of Xogomoc.

legendary.name: Action 3: Behold True Power
entries: Xogomoc unleashes lighting and wind in a chaotic storm. Each enemy within 120 feet of him must make a {@dc 25} Strength saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 44 ({@damage 8d10}) lightning damage and is moved up to 60 feet in any direction. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and isn't moved.

monster.name: Kraken
languages: understands all languages but can't speak

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The Kraken can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Discorporation
entries: When the Kraken drops to 0 hit points or dies, all conditions and other effects end for them. They teleport back to the place where they slumber, return to life with all their hit points, and fall {@condition unconscious}.

trait.name: Siege Monster
entries: The Kraken deals double damage to objects and structures.

trait.name: Slowed Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the Kraken fails a saving throw, they can choose to succeed instead, and their speed is reduced by a cumulative 10 feet for 24 hours.

trait.name: Supernatural Resistance
entries: The Kraken has advantage on saving throws against powers, spells, and other supernatural effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Kraken makes four Tentacle attacks or uses Mental Lance three times.

action.name: Tentacle
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 16} to hit, reach 30 ft., one target. {@h}19 ({@damage 2d10 + 8}) bludgeoning damage plus 11 ({@damage 2d10}) psychic damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 18}). The Kraken has ten tentacles, each of which can grapple one target.

action.name: Mental Lance (3rd-Order Power)
entries: {@atk rp} {@hit 18} to hit, range 120 ft., one creature. {@h}22 ({@damage 4d10}) psychic damage, and the target is {@condition frightened} of the Kraken until the start of the Kraken's next turn.

action.name: Psionic Storm
entries: The Kraken creates a psionic storm, entrapping a vehicle they can see within 120 feet of them. While entrapped in the storm, the vehicle is {@condition restrained}. The storm ends if the Kraken's {@status concentration} is broken (as if {@status concentration||concentrating} on a spell) or if they are more than 120 feet from the vehicle. If the Kraken's turn ends three times before the storm ends, the vehicle is reduced to 0 hit points and this effect ends.

action.name: Skull-Splitting Howl (1/Day)
entries: The Kraken telepathically howls in the mind of each enemy within 120 feet of them. Each target must make a {@dc 26} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes 55 ({@damage 10d10}) psychic damage and can't concentrate on powers or spells until the start of the Kraken's next turn. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage and suffers no other effect.

bonus.name: Telekinetic Fling
entries: The Kraken throws a creature they are grappling into an unoccupied space the Kraken can see within 60 feet of them. The target lands {@condition prone} and takes 22 ({@damage 4d10}) bludgeoning damage.

reaction.name: Psychic Reprisal
entries: When the Kraken is damaged by an attack, each enemy within 30 feet of the attacker (including the attacker) must make a {@dc 26} Wisdom saving throw, taking 22 ({@damage 4d10}) psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

legendaryHeader: The Kraken has three villain actions. They can take each action once during an encounter after an enemy's turn. The Kraken can take these actions in any order but can use only one per round.

legendary.name: Action 1: Psionic Tentacles
entries: Psionically conjured tentacles make a Tentacle attack on each enemy within 120 feet of the Kraken. The Kraken then uses Telekinetic Fling on each creature they are grappling.

legendary.name: Action 2: Psionic Ink
entries: The Kraken teleports up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space they can see. Each creature within 30 feet of the space the Kraken left must make a {@dc 26} Dexterity saving throw or be covered in psionic ink, which they can use an action to wipe away. A creature covered in psionic ink takes 16 ({@damage 3d10}) psychic damage at the start of each of their turns.

legendary.name: Action 3: The Ocean's Wrath
entries: The Kraken unleashes a wave of intense psionic power. Each creature within 120 feet of the Kraken must make a {@dc 26} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 65 ({@damage 10d12}) psychic damage and is {@condition frightened} of the Kraken for 1 minute (save ends at end of turn). On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and isn't {@condition frightened}.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting (Utility)
headerEntries: In addition to any other spells in this stat block, the treant can cast the following spells, using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 16}):

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: While the treant remains motionless, they are indistinguishable from a normal tree.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The treant makes two Thorned Tendril attacks.

action.name: Thorned Tendril
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}19 ({@damage 4d6 + 5}) piercing damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 15}). While {@condition grappled} in this way, a target is {@condition restrained} and takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) piercing damage at the start of each of their turns.

action.name: Swinging Tendrils {@recharge}
entries: The treant swings the creatures they are grappling in violent circles. Each creature {@condition grappled} by the treant takes 26 ({@damage 4d12}) bludgeoning damage, and the treant can move them into an unoccupied space the treant can see within 15 feet of the treant.

All other creatures within 15 feet of the treant must make a {@dc 17} Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 26 ({@damage 4d12}) bludgeoning damage per creature {@condition grappled} by the treant. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage.

bonus.name: Healing Growth (1/Day)
entries: Each creature of the treant's choice within 30 feet of them regains 17 ({@damage 3d8 + 4}) hit points.

bonus.name: Reel and Wrap
entries: The treant wraps one creature they have {@condition grappled} in thick vines, pulling the target up to 10 feet toward them. The target can't speak until the grapple ends.

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: While the sapling remains motionless, they are indistinguishable from a normal tree.

trait.name: Grove Strength
entries: When a non-minion ally hits a target with an attack, the target takes an extra 2 slashing damage for each sapling within 5 feet of the target.

trait.name: Minion
entries: If the sapling takes damage from an attack or as the result of a failed saving throw, their hit points are reduced to 0. If the sapling takes damage from another effect, they die if the damage equals or exceeds their hit point maximum; otherwise they take no damage.

action.name: Claws (Group Attack)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 slashing damage.

hp.special: Nine times their level (number of d12 Hit Dice equal to their level)

action.name: Signature Attack (Claw)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3 plus PB} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 2d6 plus PB} slashing damage. Beginning at 7th level, the immobilizer can make this attack twice, instead of once, when they take the Attack action on their turn.

action.name: 3rd Level: Lash Out (3/Day)
entries: As a bonus action, the immobilizer whips a vine toward a creature they can see within 30 feet of them. The target must succeed on a {@dc 10 plus PB} Strength saving throw or be pulled up to 10 feet toward the immobilizer and {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 10 plus PB}). Until this grapple ends, the immobilizer's attacks against the target deal an extra {@damage 0d1 + PB|PB} bludgeoning damage.

action.name: 5th Level: Ground Stomp (3/Day)
entries: As an action, the im - mobilizer stomps the ground. Each creature within 10 feet of the immobilizer must succeed on a {@dc 10 plus PB} Dexterity saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}. Then the immobilizer can make a signature attack with a reach of 10 feet against one {@condition prone} creature.

action.name: 7th Level: Entomb (1/Day)
entries: As a bonus action, the immobilizer calls spiky vines to surround a creature they can see within 60 feet of them. The target must make a {@dc 10 plus PB} Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes {@damage PBd10} piercing damage and is {@condition restrained}. While {@condition restrained} in this way, the target is {@condition blinded}. On a successful save, the target takes only half damage and isn't {@condition restrained}.
A creature can use their action to make a {@dc 10 plus PB} Strength ({@skill Athletics}) or Dexterity ({@skill Acrobatics}) check, freeing themself or another creature within reach on a success.

trait.name: Relentless Hunger
entries: When the troll is reduced to 0 hit points by any damage other than acid or fire damage, they don't die or fall {@condition unconscious}, and can continue moving and taking actions as usual. The troll only dies if they end their turn with 0 hit points, if acid or fire damage reduces them to 0 hit points, or if they take acid or fire damage while they have 0 hit points.

trait.name: Sluggish
entries: For 1 hour after sleep or another period of unconsciousness, the troll's speed is halved and they can't use Multiattack.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The troll makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}14 ({@damage 3d6 + 4}) piercing damage. If the target is not a Construct, an Elemental, or a Plant, the troll regains hit points equal to the damage dealt. If this attack reduces the target to 0 hit points, the troll regains twice as many hit points as they otherwise would with this attack.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Crash Through
entries: The troll moves up to their speed in a straight line, smashing through mundane obstacles in their path. The troll can enter the spaces of Large or smaller creatures during this movement, forcing those creatures to make a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 14 ({@damage 4d6}) bludgeoning damage and falls {@condition prone}. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and doesn't fall {@condition prone}.

During this move, mundane objects that aren't worn or carried by a creature take 14 ({@damage 4d6}) damage when the troll enters their space. If the troll moves into the space of a Large or larger object and this damage doesn't destroy it, the troll's movement stops and they are {@condition stunned} until the end of their next turn.

reaction.name: Spiteful Retort
entries: When the troll is reduced to 0 hit points and doesn't die, they can make a Bite attack against a creature within 5 feet of them.

trait.name: Minion
entries: If the limbjumble takes damage from an attack or as the result of a failed saving throw, their hit points are reduced to 0. If the limbjumble takes damage from another effect, they die if the damage equals or exceeds their hit point maximum; otherwise they take no damage.

action.name: Arm and a Leg (Group Attack)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}2 bludgeoning damage. If the target is Medium or smaller and if three or more limbjumbles joined the attack, the target is knocked {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Minion
entries: If the whelp takes damage from an attack or as the result of a failed saving throw, their hit points are reduced to 0. If the whelp takes damage from another effect, they die if the damage equals or exceeds their hit point maximum; otherwise they take no damage.

trait.name: Relentless Hunger
entries: When the whelp is reduced to 0 hit points by any damage other than acid or fire damage, they don't die or fall {@condition unconscious}, and can continue moving and taking actions as usual. The whelp only dies if they end their turn with 0 hit points, if acid or fire damage reduces them to 0 hit points, or if they take acid or fire damage while they have 0 hit points.

trait.name: Ripping Claws
entries: Spaces within reach of one or more whelps are difficult terrain for Medium or smaller enemies. When an enemy leaves the reach of one or more whelps who can see them, the enemy takes 2 slashing damage.

action.name: Bite (Group Attack)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 4} piercing damage, and if the target is not a Construct, an Elemental, or a Plant, each whelp who joined this attack regains all lost hit points.

monster.name: Shade
languages: the languages they knew in life

trait.name: Incorporeal Movement
entries: The shade can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. The shade is destroyed if they end their turn inside an object.

trait.name: Minion
entries: If the shade takes damage from an attack or as the result of a failed saving throw, their hit points are reduced to 0. If the shade takes damage from another effect, they die if the damage equals or exceeds their hit point maximum; otherwise they take no damage.

trait.name: Terrifying
entries: If an enemy starts their turn within 5 feet of three or more shades, the enemy must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} of the shades until the start of their next turn. The DC for this saving throw equals 10 plus the number of shades within 5 feet of the enemy. On a successful save, the enemy is immune to the Terrifying trait of all shades for the next 24 hours.

action.name: Life Drain (Group Attack)
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}1 necrotic damage.

monster.name: Shadow
languages: the languages they knew in life

trait.name: Chilling Phasing
entries: The shadow can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. The shadow takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) force damage if they end their turn inside an object. A creature takes 1 cold damage the first time a shadow passes through them on a turn.

trait.name: Dark Stalker
entries: While in dim light or darkness, the shadow has advantage on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) checks.

action.name: Chilling Grasp
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) cold damage, and the target's Dexterity score is reduced by 2. The target dies if this reduces its Dexterity to 0. Otherwise, the reduction lasts until the target finishes a short or long rest.

action.name: Freezing Dark (1/Day)
entries: The shadow pours magical darkness out of their hand in a 15-foot cone. A creature with darkvision who isn't an incorporeal Undead can't see through this darkness, and light can't illuminate it. Each creature in this darkness when it first appears must succeed on a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw or take 7 ({@damage 2d6}) cold damage. The darkness remains in that area for 1 minute or until the shadow is destroyed.

bonus.name: Shadow Bind
entries: The shadow targets one creature they can see within 15 feet of them who is in bright or dim light. The target must succeed on a {@dc 12} Strength saving throw or be {@condition grappled} by their own shadow (escape {@dc 12}). The grapple ends if the target is no longer in bright or dim light, or if the shadow who used this bonus action is destroyed.

monster.name: Specter
languages: the languages they knew in life

trait.name: Corrupting Phasing
entries: The specter can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. The specter takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) force damage if they end their turn inside an object. A creature takes 2 ({@damage 1d4}) necrotic damage the first time a specter passes through them on a turn.

action.name: Decaying Touch
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}7 ({@damage 2d6}) necrotic damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw or spend 1 Hit Die without any benefit. If the target has no Hit Dice to spend, they drop to 0 hit points instead.
If a Humanoid dies within 1 minute of being hit by this attack, their spirit rises as a specter under the GM's control in an unoccupied space nearest to where that Humanoid died.

bonus.name: Hidden Movement {@recharge 5}
entries: The specter turns {@condition invisible} and then moves up to their speed. At the end of this movement, the invisibility ends.

monster.name: Wraith
languages: the languages they knew in life

trait.name: Agonizing Phasing
entries: The wraith can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. The wraith takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) force damage if they end their turn inside an object. A creature takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) psychic damage the first time a wraith passes through them on a turn.

trait.name: Throes of Oblivion
entries: When the wraith dies, they collapse inward, creating a burst of painful psychic energy. Each creature within 20 feet of the wraith must make a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw, taking 18 ({@damage 4d8}) psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Agonizing Touch
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}14 ({@damage 4d6}) psychic damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 14} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition dazed|FleeMortals} (save ends at end of turn).

Each time a target {@condition dazed|FleeMortals} in this way fails a saving throw to end the condition, their hit point maximum is halved. This effect is cumulative, and the reduction lasts until the target finishes a short or long rest.
If a Humanoid dies within 1 minute of being hit by this attack, their spirit rises as a specter under the wraith's control in an unoccupied space nearest to where that Humanoid died.

action.name: Psychic Enervation
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 6} to hit, range 60 ft., one creature. {@h}10 ({@damage 3d6}) psychic damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 14} Wisdom saving throw or fall {@condition prone} and be {@condition frightened} of the wraith for 1 minute (save ends at end of turn). While {@condition frightened} in this way, the target can't stand up.

reaction.name: Denied Vitality
entries: When a creature who the wraith can see within 30 feet of them regains hit points, the wraith can attempt to sap the life energy restoring the creature. The creature must succeed on a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw or only regain half the number of hit points they otherwise would regain.

monster.name: Kiona the Dread Lord

trait.name: Corrupting Phasing
entries: Kiona can move through other creatures and objects. Kiona takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) force damage if she ends her turn inside an object. A creature takes 9 ({@damage 2d8}) necrotic damage the first time Kiona passes through them on a turn.

trait.name: Incorporeal Empowerment
entries: Each incorporeal Undead within 120 feet of Kiona ignores difficult terrain.

trait.name: Spiritual Sacrifice (3/Day)
entries: When Kiona fails a saving throw, she can lose 15 hit points and choose to succeed instead.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Kiona makes two Energy Siphon attacks.

action.name: Energy Siphon
entries: {@atk ms,rs} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 120 ft., one creature. {@h}15 ({@damage 3d6 + 5}) necrotic damage, and the target can't regain hit points until the start of Kiona's next turn. Kiona gains temporary hit points equal to half the damage dealt by this attack.

action.name: Rise from Death (1/Day)
entries: Kiona conjures three shadows, two specters, or one wraith under her control. Each summoned creature appears in an unoccupied space within 30 feet of Kiona and acts immediately after her turn on the same initiative count.

bonus.name: Path of Pain
entries: Kiona chooses one other incorporeal Undead within 120 feet of her who can see her. That Undead can move up to their speed.

reaction.name: Death's Breath
entries: When a creature within 5 feet of Kiona hits her with an attack, she breathes a toxin at the creature. The creature must succeed on a {@dc 17} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} until the end of their next turn.

legendaryHeader: Kiona has three villain actions. She can take each action once during an encounter after an enemy's turn. She can take these actions in any order but can use only one per round.

legendary.name: Action 1: Restrain Them!
entries: A 20-foot-radius sphere of spectral arms emerges from a point Kiona can see within 120 feet of her. Each enemy in that area must succeed on a {@dc 17} Dexterity saving throw or be {@condition restrained} until the end of Kiona's next turn.

legendary.name: Action 2: Ruinous March
entries: Kiona and each ally within 60 feet of her can move up to their speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

legendary.name: Action 3: Vitality Drain
entries: Kiona and each ally within 60 feet of her can make a melee attack (no action required). A creature hit by one of these attacks gains a level of {@condition exhaustion}.

monster.name: Ghost Sycophant

hp.special: Six times their level (number of d6 Hit Dice equal to their level)

languages: any two languages they knew in life

action.name: Signature Attack (Dark Essence)
entries: {@atk ms,rs} {@hit 3 plus PB} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 60 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d10}) necrotic damage. This spell's damage increases by {@damage 1d10} when the sycophant reaches 5th level ({@damage 2d10}), 11th level ({@damage 3d10}), and 17th level ({@damage 4d10}).

action.name: 3rd Level: Call of the Dead (3/Day)
entries: When the sycophant hits a creature with a signature attack, the target must also succeed on a {@dc 10 plus PB} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} of the sycophant for 1 minute (save ends at end of turn).

action.name: 5th Level: Astral Presence (3/Day)
entries: As an action, the sycophant becomes {@condition invisible} for 1 minute or until they use a bonus action to end this effect. While {@condition invisible}, the sycophant can move through creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain, and the sycophant's signature attacks deal an extra {@damage 0d1 + PB|PB} damage to creatures who can't see them. The sycophant takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) force damage if they end their turn inside an object.

action.name: 7th Level: Whispers of the Dead (3/Day)
