entries: As an action, the sycophant chooses up to PB creatures they can see within 30 feet of them. Each target must succeed on a {@dc 10 plus PB} Charisma saving throw or make an attack against their nearest ally (no action required). A {@condition frightened} creature has disadvantage on the saving throw.

monster.name: Crawling Claw
languages: understands the languages they knew in life but can't speak

trait.name: Minion
entries: If the claw takes damage from an attack or as the result of a failed saving throw, their hit points are reduced to 0. If the claw takes damage from another effect, they die if the damage equals or exceeds their hit point maximum; otherwise they take no damage.

action.name: Claw (Group Attack)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}1 piercing damage. If three or more crawling claws joined the attack, the target must succeed on a {@dc 10} Constitution saving throw or contract a disease called gravefilth. Whenever a power, a spell, or a similar supernatural effect causes a creature with gravefilth to regain hit points, the number of hit points they regain is halved. A creature with gravefilth can repeat the saving throw whenever they finish a long rest. On a successful save, the disease is cured.

monster.name: Decrepit Skeleton
languages: understands the languages they knew in life but can't speak

trait.name: Bone Weapons
entries: The skeleton's weapon attacks are magical. They use their bones as ammunition for their bone bow, regrowing used bones every dusk.

trait.name: Minion
entries: If the skeleton takes damage from an attack or as the result of a failed saving throw, their hit points are reduced to 0. If the skeleton takes damage from another effect, they die if the damage equals or exceeds their hit point maximum; otherwise they take no damage.

action.name: Bone Bow (Group Attack)
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 3} to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}1 piercing damage. If the target is a creature and three or more skeleton minions joined the attack, the skeletons can choose another creature they can see within 5 feet of the original target. The second target takes 2 piercing damage.

action.name: Bone Knife (Group Attack)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}1 slashing damage.

monster.name: Ghoul
languages: the languages they knew in life

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The ghoul makes one Barbed Tongue attack and one Claws attack. If both attacks hit the same creature, the target is {@condition dazed|FleeMortals} until the end of the target's next turn.

action.name: Barbed Tongue
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) slashing damage, and the target's speed is reduced by 10 feet until the end of their next turn.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) slashing damage, and the target can't take reactions until the end of their next turn.

bonus.name: Hungry Charge
entries: The ghoul moves up to half their speed in a straight line. If the ghoul moves at least 15 feet and ends this movement within 5 feet of a creature, they have advantage on the next attack roll they make against that creature until the end of the ghoul's next turn.

monster.name: Ghoul Craver
languages: the languages they knew in life

trait.name: Ever So Hungry
entries: Enemies can't take the Disengage action while three or more cravers are within 5 feet of them.

trait.name: Minion
entries: If the craver takes damage from an attack or as the result of a failed saving throw, their hit points are reduced to 0. If the craver takes damage from another effect, they die if the damage equals or exceeds their hit point maximum; otherwise they take no damage.

action.name: Just a Taste (Group Attack)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}1 slashing damage, and the next non-minion ghoul who attacks that target before the start of the craver's next turn gains a bonus to the attack roll equal to the number of cravers who joined the attack.

monster.name: Giant Zombie
languages: understands the languages they knew in life but can't speak

trait.name: Negative Nerves
entries: Whenever a creature deals 7 damage or less to the zombie, the zombie takes no damage instead.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The zombie makes two Fist attacks.

action.name: Fist
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) bludgeoning damage, and if the target is Large or smaller, they are {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 14}). The zombie has two fists, each of which can grapple one target.

action.name: Toxic Exhalation {@recharge 5}
entries: The zombie spews toxic vomit in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw, taking 14 ({@damage 4d6}) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

reaction.name: Shove Away
entries: When a Huge or smaller creature within 10 feet of the zombie hits them with a melee attack, the zombie pushes the creature up to 10 feet away.

monster.name: Rotting Zombie
languages: understands the languages they knew in life but can't speak

trait.name: Minion
entries: If the zombie takes damage from an attack or as the result of a failed saving throw, their hit points are reduced to 0. If the zombie takes damage from another effect, they die if the damage equals or exceeds their hit point maximum; otherwise they take no damage.

trait.name: Overwhelm
entries: If an enemy starts their turn within 5 feet of three or more rotting zombies who can see them, the enemy's speed is reduced by 5 feet for each rotting zombie within 5 feet of them until the start of their next turn. If this reduces the enemy's walking speed to 0, they are {@condition restrained} for the duration.

trait.name: Rise Again
entries: The first time a zombie is reduced to 0 hit points by damage other than radiant damage but their body isn't destroyed, they regain hit points equal to their hit point maximum, and they fall {@condition prone} and are {@condition incapacitated} until the start of their next turn.

action.name: Slam (Group Attack)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}1 bludgeoning damage.

monster.name: Skeleton
languages: the languages they knew in life

trait.name: Bone Weapons
entries: The skeleton's weapon attacks are magical. They use their bones as ammunition for their bone bow, regrowing used bones every dusk.

trait.name: Hail of Bones
entries: If the skeleton is reduced to 0 hit points by bludgeoning, force, or thunder damage, the skeleton is destroyed in an explosion of bone. Each creature within 5 feet of them takes 4 piercing damage.

action.name: Bone Bow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing, and if the target regains hit points before the start of the skeleton's next turn, the number of hit points the target regains is halved.

action.name: Bone Knife
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) slashing damage. If the target is a creature, they have disadvantage on attack rolls until the end of this turn.

monster.name: Wight
languages: the languages they knew in life

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The wight makes one Longsword attack and one Vitality Theft attack, or they make two Heavy Crossbow attacks.

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Heavy Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 3} to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d10 + 1}) piercing damage.

action.name: Vitality Theft
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d8}) necrotic damage, and the wight regains a number of hit points equal to half the damage dealt. Until the start of the wight's next turn, the target has disadvantage on attack rolls made against creatures other than the wight.

reaction.name: Decaying Guard
entries: When an ally the wight can see within 5 feet of them is hit by an attack, the wight forces the attacker to reroll the attack and to instead target the wight or a willing ally within 5 feet of the original target.

monster.name: Wight Siphoner
languages: the languages they knew in life

trait.name: Minion
entries: If the siphoner takes damage from an attack or as the result of a failed saving throw, their hit points are reduced to 0. If the siphoner takes damage from another effect, they die if the damage equals or exceeds their hit point maximum; otherwise they take no damage.

action.name: Grasping Resurrection (Group Attack)
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}3 necrotic damage. If three or more siphoners joined the attack, they can restore the remains of a destroyed Undead minion within 15 feet of the target. That Undead minion returns to life with all their hit points. If five or more siphoners joined the group attack, they can either choose to increase the range of this effect from 15 to 30 feet or to restore two Undead minions instead of one.

monster.name: Zombie
languages: understands the languages they knew in life but can't speak

trait.name: Negative Nerves
entries: Whenever a creature deals 5 damage or less to the zombie, the zombie takes no damage instead.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) bludgeoning damage.

reaction.name: Delayed Reflex
entries: When the zombie's Negative Nerves trait allows them to ignore damage dealt by a creature the zombie can see within 5 feet of them, the zombie makes a Slam attack with disadvantage against the creature.

monster.name: Wight Deathguard

hp.special: Eight times their level (number of d10 Hit Dice equal to their level)

languages: the languages they knew in life

action.name: Signature Attack (Longsword)
entries: {@atk m} {@hit 3 plus PB} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 1d8 plus PB} slashing damage. Beginning at 7th level, the deathguard can make this attack twice, instead of once, when they take the Attack action on their turn.

action.name: 3rd Level: Blood for Blood (3/Day)
entries: As a reaction to an ally the deathguard can see within 5 feet of them being hit with an attack, the deathguard redirects the attack to themself, potentially causing the attack to miss. If the attacker is within 5 feet of the deathguard, the deathguard can make a signature attack against the attacker.

action.name: 5th Level: Soul Thief (3/Day)
entries: As an action, the deathguard shrouds themself in dark energy. The deathguard regains {@damage PBd6} hit points, and each enemy within 5 feet of the deathguard must make a {@dc 10 plus PB} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage PBd6} necrotic damage. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage.

action.name: 7th Level: This Way! (3/Day)
entries: As an action, the deathguard moves up to their speed without provoking opportunity attacks. Each ally the deathguard passes within 5 feet of during the move can use a reaction to move up to their speed in the same direction as the deathguard without provoking opportunity attacks. Until the start of the deathguard's next turn, attacks against these allies have disadvantage.

hp.special: 6 + six times caregiver's level (number of d8 Hit Dice equal to their caregiver's level)

trait.name: Fingers for Feet
entries: While the claw is holding an object, their speed is halved. If the claw is knocked {@condition prone}, they drop anything they are holding.

action.name: Signature Attack (Claw)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3 plus PB} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 1d6 plus PB} slashing damage.

action.name: 1st Level: Thieving Attack (2 Ferocity)
entries: The claw makes a signature attack. On a hit, the attack deals an extra {@damage 0d1 + PB|PB} slashing damage, and the claw takes a random object (determined by the GM) from an easily accessed pocket, pouch, backpack, or similar container the target is wearing or carrying.

action.name: 3rd Level: Dazing Slash (5 Ferocity)
entries: The claw makes a signature attack. On a hit, the attack deals an extra {@damage 0d1 + PB|PB} slashing damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 10 plus PB} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition dazed|FleeMortals} until the start of the claw's next turn.

action.name: 5th Level: Filthy Scratch (8 Ferocity)
entries: The claw scratches a creature they can see within 5 feet of them. The target must make a {@dc 10 plus PB} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes {@damage PBd8} poison damage and is {@condition poisoned} until the start of the claw's next turn. While {@condition poisoned} in this way, the target can't regain hit points. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage and isn't {@condition poisoned}.

bonus.name: Fast Hand (3/Long Rest)
entries: The claw moves up to their speed toward the caregiver without provoking opportunity attacks. The claw can take the Use an Object action once during this movement.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting (Utility)
headerEntries: In addition to any other spells in this stat block, the lich can cast the following spells, using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 20}):

trait.name: Rejuvenation
entries: If the lich is destroyed but their soulstone is intact, their soul retreats into the stone. While the lich's soul is in the stone, a creature who can see the stone at the start of their turn must succeed on a {@dc 20} Charisma saving throw or be {@condition charmed} by the stone until the end of their next turn. While {@condition charmed} in this way, the creature must do everything in their power to move toward and touch the stone, avoiding obvious hazards.

If a creature touches the stone while the lich's soul is inside, the creature must make a {@dc 20} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature drops to 0 hit points and the lich reforms with all their hit points in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the soulstone. On a successful save, the creature loses half their hit points and the lich reforms with half their hit points in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the soulstone.
The soulstone has AC 19, 50 hit points, and immunity to all damage except force and thunder.

trait.name: Supernatural Resistance
entries: The lich has advantage on saving throws against powers, spells, and other supernatural effects.

trait.name: Turn Immunity
entries: The lich is immune to effects that turn Undead.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The lich uses Glare of Undeath and makes four attacks using Biting Acid, Disruptive Thunder, Pain of Ages, or a combination of them.

action.name: Biting Acid (3rd-Level Spell)
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 12} to hit, range 120 ft., one target. {@h}22 ({@damage 5d8}) acid damage, and the target can't regain hit points until the start of the lich's next turn.

action.name: Disruptive Thunder (3rd-Level Spell)
entries: {@atk ms,rs} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 60 ft., one target. {@h}22 ({@damage 4d10}) thunder damage. If the target is Huge or smaller, the lich can move them up to 45 feet horizontally.

action.name: Pain of Ages (3rd-Level Spell)
entries: {@atk ms,rs} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 90 ft., one creature. {@h}21 ({@damage 6d6}) psychic damage, and the first time the target hits a creature with an attack before the start of the lich's next turn, that attack deals half damage.

action.name: Glare of Undeath
entries: The lich's eyes flare with supernatural power at one creature they can see within 60 feet of them. The target must succeed on a {@dc 20} Wisdom saving throw or be compelled to hug themself tightly as protection against an unbearably cruel world. A creature hugging themself in this way is {@condition restrained} for 1 minute (save ends at end of turn). A creature the target can hear and understand can use an action to make a {@dc 20} Charisma ({@skill Persuasion}) check, ending the effect on a success.

action.name: Horrid Woe (2/Day)
entries: The lich sends negative energy coursing through a creature they can see within 90 feet of them. The target is seared with pain and must make a {@dc 20} Constitution saving throw, taking 61 ({@damage 7d8 + 30}) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. A target reduced to 0 hit points by this damage becomes stable but can't regain hit points, and their spirit turns into a wraith who appears in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of their body. This wraith acts on the lich's turn immediately after them, and they obey the lich's verbal commands to the best of their ability. If the wraith or lich are destroyed, the wraith disappears, the target's spirit returns to their body, and the target can regain hit points.

action.name: Life Absorption (1/Day; 9th-Level Spell; Concentration)
entries: The lich unleashes a wave of life-sapping energy. Each enemy within 120 feet of them must make a {@dc 20} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes 16 ({@damage 3d10}) necrotic damage at the start of each of their turns for 1 minute, and the lich gains temporary hit points equal to the total damage dealt.

bonus.name: Necrotic Form (3rd-Level Spell)
entries: The lich enters a shadow form and moves up to their speed. While in this form, the lich is immune to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage and the {@condition grappled} and {@condition restrained} conditions, and they can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing. The lich reverts to their true form at the end of their turn.

reaction.name: Immortal Insight
entries: When another creature the lich can see makes an attack roll, ability check, or saving throw, the lich can cause the roll to be made with advantage or disadvantage.

monster.name: High Mage Vairae

trait.name: Draining Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If Vairae fails a saving throw, they can choose to succeed instead. When they do, Vairae has disadvantage on spell attacks until the end of their next turn.

trait.name: Rejuvenation
entries: Vairae has the Rejuvenation trait found in the lich stat block.

trait.name: Supernatural Resistance
entries: Vairae has advantage on saving throws against powers, spells, and other supernatural effects.

trait.name: Turn Immunity
entries: Vairae is immune to effects that turn Undead.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Vairae uses Glare of Undeath and makes four attacks using Conflagration, Immortal Pain, Magic Drain, or a combination of them.

action.name: Conflagration (4th-Level Spell)
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 14} to hit, range 150 ft., one target. {@h}35 ({@damage 10d6}) fire damage, and if the target takes both an action and a bonus action on their next turn, they take an extra 17 ({@damage 5d6}) fire damage at the end of that turn.

action.name: Immortal Pain (4th-Level Spell)
entries: {@atk ms,rs} {@hit 14} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 90 ft., one creature. {@h}28 ({@damage 8d6}) psychic damage, and the target is afflicted with pain. While afflicted in this way, the creature's attacks deal half damage. After each attack the afflicted creature makes against an enemy, the afflicted creature can make a {@dc 22} Constitution saving throw, ending the effect on a success. A {@psionic cure ailment|TalPsi} power, a {@spell lesser restoration} spell, or a similar supernatural effect also ends the effect.

action.name: Magic Drain (4th-Level Spell)
entries: {@atk ms,rs} {@hit 14} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 60 ft., one creature. {@h}26 ({@damage 4d12}) necrotic damage. If the target is currently affected by any spells not cast by Vairae, the target must succeed on a {@dc 22} Wisdom saving throw or those effects end for the target.

action.name: Glare of Undeath
entries: Vairae glares at one creature they can see within 60 feet of them. The target must succeed on a {@dc 22} Wisdom saving throw or be compelled to hug themself tightly as protection against an unbearably cruel world. A creature hugging themself in this way is {@condition restrained} for 1 minute (save ends at end of turn). A creature the target can hear and understand can use an action to make a {@dc 22} Charisma ({@skill Persuasion}) check, ending the effect on a success.

action.name: Machinations of Bone (2/Day)
entries: Each enemy within 30 feet of a point Vairae can see within 150 feet of them must make a {@dc 22} Strength saving throw. On a failed save, a target's innards fly from their body and they take 54 ({@damage 12d8}) piercing damage, fall {@condition prone}, and can't stand up until they recieve supernatural healing.

bonus.name: Necrotic Form (3rd-Level Spell)
entries: Vairae enters a shadow form and can move up to their speed. While in this form, Vairae is immune to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage and the {@condition grappled} and {@condition restrained} conditions, and they can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch without squeezing. Vairae reverts to their true form at the end of their turn.

reaction.name: Baleful Teleport (6th-Level Spell)
entries: When a creature Vairae can see within 120 feet of them targets Vairae with an attack, Vairae utters a word of arcane power. The creature must succeed on a {@dc 22} Charisma saving throw or be teleported up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space Vairae can see, and if Vairae is no longer a valid target for the triggering attack, the attacker must choose a new target or the attack misses.

legendaryHeader: Vairae has three villain actions. They can take each action once during an encounter after an enemy's turn. They can take these actions in any order but can use only one per round.

legendary.name: Action 1: Cages of Wasting
entries: A cage of black energy springs forth around each enemy within 60 feet of Vairae. Each target must make a {@dc 22} Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes 27 ({@damage 5d10}) necrotic damage and is {@condition restrained} in the cage for 1 minute or until Vairae is destroyed (save ends at end of turn). On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage and isn't {@condition restrained}. If a {@condition restrained} creature teleports out of their cage, the effect ends for them.

legendary.name: Action 2: My Magic Alone
entries: Vairae unleashes a wave of canceling magic. Each creature within 60 feet of Vairae must make a {@dc 22} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, a target can't benefit from magic items or cast spells of 4th level or higher until the end of Vairae's next turn.

legendary.name: Action 3: Necrostorm
entries: Vairae fires black bolts of magic from their body. Each creature within 60 feet of them must make a {@dc 22} Dexterity saving throw, taking 78 ({@damage 12d12}) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The spirit of a Humanoid killed by this damage rises at the start of Vairae's next turn as a wraith who permanently follows Vairae's verbal commands.

monster.name: Dirt Mournling
languages: understands the languages of their creator but can't speak

trait.name: Anguish Unleashed
entries: When the mournling dies, the sadness they contain is released into the world. Each creature within 30 feet of the mournling who can hear them must make a {@dc 19} Wisdom saving throw, taking 22 ({@damage 4d10}) psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

trait.name: Immutable Form
entries: The mournling is immune to any power, spell, or effect that would alter their form.

trait.name: Puddle of Mud
entries: When the mournling leaves a space, the ground in that space becomes difficult terrain for their enemies for 10 minutes.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The mournling makes three attacks using Slam, Mudslide, or both, and they can use Dust Storm, if available.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}28 ({@damage 4d10 + 6}) bludgeoning damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 20}). While {@condition grappled} in this way, the target is {@condition restrained}.

action.name: Mudslide
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 12} to hit, range 30/60 ft., one target. {@h}22 ({@damage 3d10 + 6}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Huge or smaller creature, the target and each Huge or smaller creature of the mournling's choice within 5 feet of the target are pulled up to 30 feet toward the mournling.

action.name: Dust Storm (1/Day)
entries: The mournling hurls dirt, gravel, and sand. Each creature within 60 feet of them must succeed on a {@dc 19} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition blinded} for 1 minute (save ends at end of turn).

bonus.name: Break and Reform
entries: The mournling teleports to an unoccupied space they can see within 30 feet of them.

reaction.name: Stuck Fast
entries: When the mournling is hit by a melee weapon attack, they capture the weapon that struck them in quickhardening mud, disarming the attacker. A creature who can reach the weapon can use an action or bonus action to make a {@dc 19} Strength ({@skill Athletics}) check, freeing the weapon on a success. The mournling can't use this reaction on attacks made with natural weapons.

monster.name: Flesh Mournling
languages: understands the languages of their creator but can't speak

trait.name: Horrid Sob
entries: When an enemy who can hear the mournling starts their turn within 30 feet of the mournling, the enemy must succeed on a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} of the mournling until the start of their next turn. A creature who succeeds on their saving throw is immune to the Horrid Sob of all flesh mournlings for 24 hours.

trait.name: Immutable Form
entries: The mournling is immune to any power, spell, or effect that would alter their form.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The mournling makes two Slam attacks.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 3d6 + 4}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is {@condition frightened} of the mournling, the target falls {@condition prone}.

action.name: Agonizing Wail {@recharge 5}
entries: The flesh mournling screams with unbearable pain in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area who can hear the mournling must make a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature's eyes water uncontrollably, they take 16 ({@damage 3d10}) psychic damage, and they can't see anything more than 5 feet away until the end of their next turn. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and suffers no other effect.

monster.name: Mummy
languages: the languages they knew in life

trait.name: Flammable
entries: Whenever the mummy takes fire damage, they take an extra 5 ({@damage 1d10}) fire damage.

trait.name: Mummy Dust
entries: Whenever the mummy takes piercing or slashing damage, each creature within 5 feet of them takes 4 ({@damage 1d8}) poison damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The mummy makes two Desiccating Slam attacks and uses Guardian Curse.

action.name: Desiccating Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) bludgeoning damage. Until the start of the mummy's next turn, the target's speed is reduced by 10 feet and the target can't regain hit points.

action.name: Guardian Curse
entries: The mummy calls down a scourge on one creature they can see within 60 feet of them. The target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw or be cursed. While cursed in this way, whenever the target takes damage, they take an extra 3 ({@damage 1d6}) necrotic damage that can't be reduced in any way. The curse lasts until removed by a {@psionic cure ailment|TalPsi} power, a {@spell remove curse} spell, or a similar supernatural effect. A target who succeeds on their saving throw is immune to the Guardian Curse of all mummies for the next 24 hours.

monster.name: Mummy Rotwrap
languages: the languages they knew in life

trait.name: Minion
entries: If the rotwrap takes damage from an attack or as the result of a failed saving throw, their hit points are reduced to 0. If the rotwrap takes damage from another effect, they die if the damage equals or exceeds their hit point maximum; otherwise they take no damage.

action.name: Words of Ancient Doom (Group Attack)
entries: {@atk ms,rs} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30 ft., one creature. {@h}4 necrotic damage, and if three or more rotwraps joined the attack, the target can't speak or use telepathy until the end of their next turn.

monster.name: Ashyra

trait.name: Atonement (3/Day)
entries: If Ashyra fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead. When she does, she must either end the effect of her Ancient Curse on one enemy within 120 feet of her or be {@condition dazed|FleeMortals} until the end of her next turn.

trait.name: Mummy Dust
entries: Whenever Ashyra takes piercing or slashing damage, each creature within 5 feet of her takes 9 ({@damage 2d8}) poison damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Ashyra makes two attacks using Desiccating Slam, Soul Fire, or both, and she uses Ancient Curse.

action.name: Desiccating Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 3d6 + 4}) bludgeoning damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) necrotic damage. The target's speed is reduced to 0, and they can't regain hit points until the start of Ashyra's next turn.

action.name: Soul Fire (3rd-Level Spell)
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 9} to hit, range 60 ft., one target. {@h}20 ({@damage 3d10 + 4}) radiant damage, and if the target is a creature, their hit point maximum decreases by a number equal to the damage taken. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest or is targeted by a {@psionic cure ailment|TalPsi} power of 4th order or higher, a {@spell greater restoration} spell, or a similar supernatural effect. The target dies if this effect reduces their hit point maximum to 0.

action.name: Ancient Curse
entries: Ashyra inflicts weakness on one creature she can see within 120 feet of her. The target must succeed on a {@dc 17} Wisdom saving throw or be cursed. While the target is cursed in this way, their attacks deal half damage. The curse lasts until Ashyra chooses to end it or until removed by a {@psionic cure ailment|TalPsi} power, a {@spell remove curse} spell, or a similar supernatural effect.

bonus.name: Misty Step (2nd-Level Spell)
entries: Ashyra teleports up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space she can see.

reaction.name: Weight of Ages
entries: When a creature Ashyra can see within 60 feet of her deals damage to her, Ashyra brings down the weight of ages on them. The creature must succeed on a {@dc 17} Strength saving throw or be {@condition restrained} until the end of their next turn.

legendaryHeader: Ashyra has three villain actions. She can take each action once during an encounter after an enemy's turn. She can take these actions in any order but can use only one per round.

legendary.name: Action 1: Sands of the Ancients
entries: A storm of stinging dirt whirls around Ashyra in a 15-foot-radius until the end of her next turn. For the duration, that area is heavily obscured, and when a creature starts their turn in or enters that area for the first time on a turn, they must succeed on a {@dc 17} Constitution saving throw or take 22 ({@damage 4d10}) necrotic damage.

legendary.name: Action 2: Dust to Dust
entries: Ashyra bursts into a cloud of dust and makes one Desiccating Slam attack against each enemy within 60 feet of her, then she reforms in an unoccupied space within 60 feet of her original location.

legendary.name: Action 3: Last Rites
entries: Ashyra commands the land to entomb her foes. Each enemy within 30 feet of her must make a {@dc 17} Strength saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes 21 ({@damage 6d6}) bludgeoning damage and is entombed in stone. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage and is not entombed. An entombed creature is {@condition restrained}, has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the stone, and takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) necrotic damage at the end of each of their turns. The creature can be freed if the stone is destroyed (AC 17; 30 hit points; immunity to poison and psychic damage).

monster.name: Blood-Starved Vampire
languages: the languages they knew in life

trait.name: Minion
entries: If the vampire takes damage from an attack or as the result of a failed saving throw, their hit points are reduced to 0. If the vampire takes damage from another effect, they die if the damage equals or exceeds their hit point maximum; otherwise they take no damage.

trait.name: Radiant Weakening
entries: The vampire has disadvantage on saving throws against effects that deal radiant damage.

action.name: Feeding Frenzy (Group Attack)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}2 piercing damage plus 3 necrotic damage. If two or more vampires joined the attack, the target's hit point maximum is reduced by a number equal to the necrotic damage dealt. The reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest or is targeted by a {@psionic cure ailment|TalPsi} power, a {@spell lesser restoration} spell, or a similar supernatural effect. The target dies if this attack reduces their hit point maximum to 0.

monster.name: Vampire
languages: the languages they knew in life

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting (Utility)
headerEntries: In addition to any other spells in this stat block, the vampire can cast the following spells, using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 18}):

trait.name: Radiant Aversion
entries: Each time the vampire takes radiant damage, they take an extra 10 radiant damage.

trait.name: Resting Place
entries: When the vampire drops to 0 hit points and is not in sunlight, running water, or their resting place, the vampire teleports to their resting place. While in their resting place, the vampire is stable. After spending 1 hour in their resting place with 0 hit points, they regain 1 hit point.

trait.name: Turn Resistance
entries: The vampire has advantage on saving throws against any effect that turns undead.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The vampire makes two Claw attacks and, if possible, a Bite attack.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) slashing damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) necrotic damage. If the target is Large or smaller, they are {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 18}). While {@condition grappled} in this way, the target is {@condition restrained}. Moving while grappling a Medium or smaller creature doesn't halve the vampire's speed. A vampire can have only one target {@condition grappled} in this way at a time.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature who is {@condition grappled} by the vampire, {@condition incapacitated}, or {@condition restrained}. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d6 + 5}) piercing damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) necrotic damage. The target's hit point maximum is reduced by a number equal to the necrotic damage taken, and the vampire regains hit points equal to that number. The reduction lasts until reversed by a {@psionic cure ailment|TalPsi} power of 4th order or higher, a {@spell greater restoration} spell, or a similar supernatural effect. The target dies if this attack reduces their hit point maximum to 0. A Humanoid slain in this way rises the following midnight as a vampire spawn under the vampire's control.

action.name: Exsanguinating Mist {@recharge}
entries: The vampire, along with anything they are wearing or carrying, turns into a cloud of blood-sucking mist. When they do, they release any creature they were grappling, and if the vampire was {@condition grappled} or {@condition restrained}, that effect ends for them. Then the vampire flies up to twice their speed to an unoccupied space. During this move, the vampire ignores difficult terrain, doesn't provoke opportunity attacks, and can move through creatures and objects. Each creature the vampire passes through must make a {@dc 18} Constitution saving throw, taking 35 ({@damage 10d6}) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. At the end of this movement, the vampire transforms back into their previous form.

bonus.name: Beguile
entries: The vampire targets one creature they can see within 30 feet of them and who can see them. The target must make a {@dc 18} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the target uses their reaction, if available, to move up to their speed to a location chosen by the vampire, then either makes a melee attack against a target of the vampire's choice or falls {@condition prone} (vampire's choice).

Creatures who can't be {@condition charmed} automatically succeed on this saving throw, and creatures who have advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed} make this saving throw with advantage.

bonus.name: Inhuman Agility
entries: The vampire moves up to their speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

reaction.name: Run, My Child
entries: When an ally the vampire can see takes damage, the vampire can command the ally to move up to their speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

monster.name: Vampire Spawn
languages: the languages they knew in life

trait.name: Radiant Aversion
entries: Each time the spawn takes radiant damage, they take an extra 10 radiant damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The spawn makes two Claw attacks. They can replace one attack with a Bite attack.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) slashing damage, and if the target is Large or smaller, they are {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 15}). Moving while grappling a Medium or smaller creature doesn't halve the spawn's speed. The spawn can have only one target {@condition grappled} in this way at a time.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature who is {@condition grappled} by the spawn, {@condition incapacitated}, or {@condition restrained}. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) piercing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) necrotic damage. The target's hit point maximum is reduced by a number equal to the necrotic damage taken, and the spawn regains hit points equal to that number. The reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest or is targeted by a {@psionic cure ailment|TalPsi} power of 4th order or higher, a {@spell greater restoration} spell, or a similar supernatural effect. The target dies if this attack reduces their hit point maximum to 0.

bonus.name: Inhuman Speed
entries: The spawn moves up to their speed.

monster.name: Count Rhodar von Glauer

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting (Utility)
headerEntries: In addition to any other spells in this stat block, Rhodar can cast the following spells, using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 20}):

trait.name: Resting Place
entries: When Rhodar drops to 0 hit points and isn't in his resting place, he teleports to his resting place. While in his resting place, Rhodar is stable. After spending 1 hour in his resting place with 0 hit points, he regains 1 hit point.

trait.name: Spear Sacrifice (3/Day)
entries: Rhodar is surrounded by three floating spears of shimmering darkness, which he can summon to a free hand on his turn (no action required). When Rhodar fails an ability check or saving throw, he can choose to destroy one of these spears and succeed on the ability check or saving throw instead. Once Rhodar destroys all three spears, he can't use his Spear of the Damned attack or Spear Sacrifice until the next dusk, when he manifests any destroyed spears.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Rhodar makes two Sanguinus attacks, and he can make one Spear of the Damned attack for each Spear Sacrifice use he has remaining.

action.name: Sanguinus
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d6 + 6}) slashing damage plus 14 ({@damage 4d6}) necrotic damage. If the target is a creature, their hit point maximum is reduced by a number equal to the necrotic damage taken, and Rhodar regains hit points equal to that number. This reduction lasts until reversed by a {@psionic cure ailment|TalPsi} power of 4th order or higher, a {@spell greater restoration} spell, or a similar supernatural effect.
The target dies if this effect reduces their hit point maximum to 0. A humanoid slain in this way rises the following midnight as a vampire spawn under Rhodar's control.

action.name: Spear of the Damned
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 12} to hit, range 60 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 3d6}) force damage, and if the target is a creature, they are knocked {@condition prone} and {@condition restrained} as a spear of darkness impales them. A creature can attempt to free themself or another creature within their reach by using an action or a bonus action to make a {@dc 20} Strength ({@skill Athletics}) check. On a success, the creature is freed and the {@condition restrained} condition ends for them. The creature is also freed if Rhodar summons that spear to attack another target or destroys it using Spear Sacrifice.

bonus.name: Beguile
entries: Rhodar targets one creature he can see within 30 feet of him and who can see him. The target must make a {@dc 20} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature uses their reaction, if available, to move up to their speed to a location chosen by Rhodar, then either makes a melee attack against a target of Rhodar's choice or falls {@condition prone} (Rhodar's choice).

bonus.name: Inhuman Agility
entries: Rhodar moves up to his speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

reaction.name: Withering Stare
entries: When Rhodar is hit by an attack by a creature he can see within 60 feet of him, his eyes bore into the creature. The target must succeed on a {@dc 20} Wisdom saving throw or take 10 ({@damage 3d6}) necrotic damage.

legendaryHeader: Rhodar has three villain actions. He can take each action once during an encounter after an enemy's turn. He can take these actions in any order but can use only one per round.

legendary.name: Action 1: Bloodstained
entries: Rhodar causes blood to explode in a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on a point he can see within 120 feet of him. Creatures who aren't Undead in that area must succeed on a {@dc 20} Dexterity saving throw or be bloodstained until the end of Rhodar's next turn. Rhodar has advantage on attack rolls against bloodstained creatures, and bloodstained creatures have disadvantage on saving throws against Rhodar's Beguile bonus action.

legendary.name: Action 2: Fire Drake
entries: Rhodar, along with anything he is wearing or carrying, turns into a Large dragon made of fire. When he does, he releases any creature he was grappling, and if Rhodar was {@condition grappled} or {@condition restrained}, that effect ends for him. He then flies up to twice his speed to an unoccupied space. During this move, Rhodar ignores difficult terrain, doesn't provoke opportunity attacks, and can move through creatures and objects. Each creature Rhodar passes through must make a {@dc 20} Dexterity saving throw, taking 36 ({@damage 8d8}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. At the end of this movement, Rhodar transforms back into his previous form.

legendary.name: Action 3: Mist of Blades
entries: Rhodar fills the area within 60 feet of him with thick swirling mists, heavily obscuring that area for other creatures. He can teleport up to four times into any unoccupied space in the mist and make one Sanguinus attack after each teleport. The mist dissipates at the end of this action.

monster.name: Vampire Neophyte

hp.special: Eight times their level (number of d10 Hit Dice equal to their level)

languages: any two languages they knew in life

action.name: Signature Attack (Claws)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3 plus PB} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 1d8 plus PB} slashing damage. Beginning at 7th level, the neophyte can make this attack twice, instead of once, when they take the Attack action on their turn.

action.name: 3rd Level: Take Away (3/Day)
entries: When the neophyte hits a creature with a signature attack, the neophyte grabs the target. The target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 10 plus PB}), and the neophyte moves up to their speed without provoking attacks of opportunity (no action required). If the {@condition grappled} creature is Medium or smaller, they don't cost the neophyte extra movement.

action.name: 5th Level: Blood Seeker (3/Day)
entries: As an action, the neophyte moves up to their speed toward a creature they can see within 60 feet of them. If the neophyte ends their movement within 5 feet of the creature, the target must succeed on a {@dc 10 plus PB} Dexterity saving throw or be {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 10 plus PB}) and take {@damage 1d4} piercing damage plus {@damage PBd8} necrotic damage. The neophyte regains hit points equal to half the necrotic damage dealt.

action.name: 7th Level: Child of the Night (3/Day)
entries: As a reaction to taking damage, the neophyte disappears in a cloud of bats and insects. Every enemy within 10 feet of the neophyte must make a {@dc 10 plus PB} Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes {@damage PBd4} piercing damage plus {@damage PBd4} slashing damage. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage. At the end of the turn, the neophyte reforms in an unoccupied space within 30 feet of where they disappeared.

trait.name: Immutable Form
entries: The bodyguard is immune to any power, spell, or effect that would alter their form.

trait.name: Supernatural Resistance
entries: The bodyguard has advantage on saving throws against powers, spells, and other supernatural effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The bodyguard makes three attacks using Axe Arm, Repeating Crossbow, or both.

action.name: Axe Arm
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}18 ({@damage 2d12 + 5}) slashing damage. If the target is wielding at least one weapon, they must make a {@dc 16} Strength saving throw. On a failed save, the target drops one weapon they wield of the bodyguard's choice, and the bodyguard kicks it up to 15 feet away.

action.name: Repeating Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 3} to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 3d10}) piercing damage.

bonus.name: Magnetic Pull
entries: Each enemy wearing metal armor or made of metal within 30 feet of the bodyguard must succeed on a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw or be pulled up to 15 feet toward the bodyguard.

reaction.name: Valiar Cloak
entries: When an attack hits a Medium or smaller ally the bodyguard can see within 5 feet of them, the bodyguard forces the attacker to reroll the attack against the bodyguard instead.

trait.name: Immutable Form
entries: The chief is immune to any power, spell, or effect that would alter their form.

trait.name: Supernatural Resistance
entries: The chief has advantage on saving throws against powers, spells, and other supernatural effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The chief makes three attacks using Pneumatic Fist, Targeting Beam, or both.

action.name: Pneumatic Fist
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}21 ({@damage 3d10 + 5}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is Medium or smaller, the chief can push them up to 10 feet away.

action.name: Targeting Beam
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 10} to hit, range 150 ft., one target. {@h}26 ({@damage 4d12}) force damage, and the target is marked by a beam of red light until the end of the chief's next turn. While the target is marked, attack rolls against them have advantage.

bonus.name: Chief's Command
entries: The chief shouts a command to an ally within 60 feet of them who can hear them. The ally can either move up to their speed without provoking opportunity attacks or make a melee attack (no action required).

trait.name: Immutable Form
entries: The builder is immune to any power, spell, or effect that would alter their form.

trait.name: Siege Monster
entries: The builder deals double damage to objects and structures.

trait.name: Supernatural Resistance
entries: The builder has advantage on saving throws against powers, spells, and other supernatural effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The builder makes two attacks using Wrecking Ball, Stone, or both, and can use Lay the Foundation, if available.

action.name: Wrecking Ball
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}26 ({@damage 3d12 + 7}) bludgeoning damage.
Each enemy within 5 feet of the target must succeed on a {@dc 19} Dexterity saving throw or take 13 ({@damage 2d12}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Stone
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 10 ft. or range 60/240 ft., one target. {@h}23 ({@damage 3d10 + 7}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, they are knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Lay the Foundation {@recharge}
entries: The builder pours wet concrete on the ground in a 20-foot square starting from a point within 5 feet of the builder. Until the foundation dries in 1 hour, that area is difficult terrain, and when a creature with a Strength score of 20 or less starts their turn in that area, they must succeed on a {@dc 19} Strength ({@skill Athletics}) check or be {@condition restrained} until the start of their next turn.

trait.name: Immutable Form
entries: The engine is immune to any power, spell, or effect that would alter their form.

trait.name: Siege Monster
entries: The engine deals double damage to objects and structures.

trait.name: Supernatural Resistance
entries: The engine has advantage on saving throws against powers, spells, and other supernatural effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The engine makes two attacks using Blade Rake, Force Cannon, or both.

action.name: Blade Rake
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}35 ({@damage 4d12 + 9}) slashing damage. If the target is Large or smaller, they are pulled up to 15 feet toward the engine.

action.name: Force Cannon
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 12} to hit, range 400 ft., one target. {@h}33 ({@damage 6d10}) force damage, and the target is {@condition dazed|FleeMortals} until the end of their next turn.

action.name: Burning Oil {@recharge}
entries: The engine shoots burning oil in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 20} Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 52 ({@damage 15d6}) fire damage and is covered in scalding oil. A creature covered in scalding oil takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) fire damage at the start of each of their turns. A creature can use an action to remove the oil from themself or a creature they can reach, ending the effect. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and is not covered in scalding oil.

bonus.name: Destructive Rollout
entries: The engine moves up to their speed in a straight line, destroying mundane walls in their path that are less than 10 feet thick. Medium or smaller mundane objects in the engine's path are destroyed if the objects aren't being worn or carried by a creature. The engine can move through the spaces of other creatures during this movement as if they were difficult terrain, and if the engine does so, the creature must succeed on a {@dc 20} Dexterity saving throw or take 11 ({@damage 2d10}) bludgeoning damage and be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The voiceless talker manifests a power and makes one Tentacle or Psionic Pistol attack.

action.name: Tentacle
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d10 + 4}) psychic damage, and if the target is Large or smaller, they are {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 15}).

action.name: Psionic Pistol
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 7} to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d10 + 4}) force damage.

action.name: Memory Thief (4th-Order Power)
entries: The voiceless talker psionically plunders the mind of a creature they can see within 30 feet of them. The target must make a {@dc 15} Intelligence saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes 22 ({@damage 4d10}) psychic damage, and until they finish a long rest or die, their proficiency bonus is cumulatively lowered by 1 and the voiceless talker gains a cumulative +2 bonus to damage rolls. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage and doesn't have their proficiency bonus reduced.
A creature whose proficiency bonus drops to 0 can't form new thoughts or speak, and they have disadvantage on ability checks, attack rolls, and saving throws.

action.name: Flay (3/Day; 5th-Order Power)
entries: The voiceless talker shoots forth a 15-foot cone of pure psionic energy. Each creature in the area must make a {@dc 15} Intelligence saving throw, taking 28 ({@damage 8d6}) psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Guise (3rd-Order Power)
entries: The voiceless talker projects a psionic image over their body, transforming their appearance for 1 hour into that of a Medium creature they have seen. When they manifest this power, they can also change the appearance of any equipment they carry for the duration.

The changes wrought by this power fail to hold up to physical inspection. A creature can use an action to inspect the voiceless talker's appearance and make a {@dc 15} Intelligence ({@skill Investigation}) check, noticing the image is a projection on a success.

reaction.name: Brain Drain
entries: When a creature {@condition grappled} by the voiceless talker makes a saving throw against one of the voiceless talker's powers, the voiceless talker momentarily weakens the creature and the creature has disadvantage on the saving throw.

trait.name: Phasing Rifle (1/Turn)
entries: When the artillerist hits a target with their Psionic Rifle attack, the artillerist can attempt to teleport the target (no action required). The target must succeed on a {@dc 17} Wisdom saving throw or be teleported to an unoccupied space the artillerist can see within 60 feet of the artillerist.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The artillerist makes two Psionic Rifle attacks, or they manifest a power and make one Phasing Tentacles attack.

action.name: Psionic Rifle
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 9} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}21 ({@damage 3d10 + 5}) force damage.

action.name: Phasing Tentacles
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}21 ({@damage 3d10 + 5}) psychic damage, and if the target is Large or smaller, the artillerist can choose one of the following effects: the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 17}) or teleported up to 15 feet to an unoccupied space the artillerist can see.

action.name: *Memory Thief (5th-Order Power)
entries: The artillerist psionically plunders the mind of a creature they can see within 30 feet of them. The target must make a {@dc 17} Intelligence saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes 33 ({@damage 6d10}) psychic damage, and until they finish a long rest or die, their proficiency bonus is lowered by 1 and the artillerist gains a cumulative +2 bonus to damage rolls. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage and doesn't have their proficiency bonus reduced.
A creature whose proficiency bonus drops to 0 can't form new thoughts or speak, and they have disadvantage on ability checks, attack rolls, and saving throws.

action.name: Guise (3rd-Order Power)
entries: The artillerist projects a psionic image over their body, transforming their appearance for 1 hour into that of a Medium creature they have seen. When they manifest this power, they can also change the appearance of any equipment they carry for the duration.

The changes wrought by this power fail to hold up to physical inspection. A creature can use an action to inspect the artillerist's appearance and make a {@dc 17} Intelligence ({@skill Investigation}) check, noticing the image is a projection on a success.

bonus.name: *Vanish for One (3/Day; 3rd-Order Power; Concentration)
entries: The artillerist cloaks themself from the sight of a creature the artillerist can see within 60 feet of them. The creature must succeed on a {@dc 17} Wisdom saving throw or the artillerist becomes {@condition invisible} to the creature for 1 minute (save ends at end of turn). This effect ends early if the artillerist attacks the creature, deals damage to them, or creates an effect that forces them to make a saving throw.

trait.name: Minion
entries: If the graywarper takes damage from an attack or as the result of a failed saving throw, their hit points are reduced to 0. If the graywarper takes damage from another effect, they die if the damage equals or exceeds their hit point maximum; otherwise they take no damage.

trait.name: Psionic Nexus
entries: When a non-minion voiceless talker within 30 feet of the graywarper uses telepathy or manifests a psionic power, they can do so as if they were in the graywarper's space.

action.name: Phase Chant (Group Attack)
entries: {@atk mp,rp} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 60 ft., one target. {@h}4 psychic damage. If the target is a creature and if three or more graywarpers joined the attack, the target must make a Charisma saving throw. The DC for this saving throw is 11 plus the number of graywarpers who joined the attack. On a failed save, the target becomes phased until the end of their next turn. While phased, the creature is translucent and immaterial, and they deal half damage with weapon attacks and unarmed strikes.

trait.name: Psionic Immunity
entries: The hulking brain is unaffected by psionic powers manifested by voiceless talkers unless the brain wishes to be.

trait.name: Psychic Scream
entries: When the brain drops to 0 hit points, each creature within 30 feet of them must make a {@dc 16} Wisdom saving throw, taking 21 ({@damage 6d6}) psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The brain makes three Bash attacks.

action.name: Bash
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) bludgeoning damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 15}). Until the grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained} and has disadvantage on saving throws against psionic powers. The brain can grapple up to four creatures at once.

action.name: Squeeze
entries: Each creature {@condition grappled} by the brain must make a {@dc 16} Strength saving throw, taking 22 ({@damage 4d10}) bludgeoning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

bonus.name: Psionic Invigoration (1/Day)
entries: Each willing voiceless talker within 60 feet of the brain regains the use of one psionic power of the voiceless talker's choice, and the voiceless talker has advantage on attack rolls until the end of the brain's next turn.

trait.name: Amorphous
entries: The mindkiller can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

trait.name: Psionic Immunity
entries: The mindkiller is unaffected by psionic powers manifested by voiceless talkers unless the mindkiller wishes to be.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 2d4 + 2}) slashing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) psychic damage, and if the target is a Medium or smaller creature, they are {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 12}).

action.name: Concealing Strike
entries: {@atk rp} {@hit 5} to hit, range 30 ft., one creature. {@h}13 ({@damage 3d6 + 3}) psychic damage, and the mindkiller is {@condition invisible} to the target until the end of the mindkiller's next turn.

action.name: Mindwipe
entries: A Humanoid {@condition grappled} by the mindkiller must succeed on a {@dc 12} Strength saving throw or the mindkiller enters the Humanoid's body. While inside a Humanoid, the mindkiller has total cover against attacks and other effects originating outside the Humanoid, and the only action the mindkiller can take is to leave the body, exiting in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the body.

When a Humanoid ends their turn with the mindkiller inside of them, they must succeed on a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw or take 10 necrotic damage. If the Humanoid is reduced to 0 hit points, they die and the mindkiller takes over the body, which regains hit points equal to the Humanoid's hit point maximum. The mindkiller retains their Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma scores, their understanding of Deep Speech and Undercommon, and their telepathy. They otherwise adopt the target's statistics and can take the actions the creature could take. They know everything the creature knew, including spells, class features, traits, and languages. If the body is reduced to 0 hit points after the mindkiller takes control, the mindkiller must leave it.

A creature wielding a sharp tool or weapon within reach of a Humanoid host or body with a mindkiller inside can use an action to attempt to remove the mindkiller, making an attack roll against the Humanoid's AC if the host is unwilling. On a hit, the creature deals 11 ({@damage 2d10}) slashing damage to the host and must make a {@dc 15} Wisdom ({@skill Medicine}) check. On a successful check, the creature cuts the mindkiller out of the host. On a faiIed check, if this slashing damage reduced the host to 0 hit points, the mindkiller kills the host; otherwise, there is no effect.

trait.name: Amorphous
entries: The whelp can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

trait.name: Minion
entries: If the whelp takes damage from an attack or as the result of a failed saving throw, their hit points are reduced to 0. If the whelp takes damage from another effect, they die if the damage equals or exceeds their hit point maximum; otherwise they take no damage.

trait.name: Psionic Immunity
entries: The whelp is unaffected by psionic powers manifested by voiceless talkers unless the whelp wishes to be.

trait.name: Resistance Drain
entries: When an enemy within 5 feet of three or more whelps makes a saving throw against a power or psionic effect, the enemy takes a penalty to the save equal to the number of whelps within 5 feet of them.

action.name: Claws (Group Attack)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}2 slashing damage.

monster.name: Lord Syuul

trait.name: Draw In
entries: If Lord Syuul fails a saving throw while grappling at least one enemy, he can choose to release all {@condition grappled} creatures and succeed on the saving throw instead.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Lord Syuul makes two Tentacle or two Psionic Repeater attacks then manifests a power or uses Memory Transfer.

action.name: Tentacle
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}28 ({@damage 4d10 + 6}) psychic damage, and if the target is Large or smaller, they are {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 19}).

action.name: Psionic Repeater
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 11} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}22 ({@damage 3d10 + 6}) force damage.

action.name: Brain Overload (1/Day; 6th-Order Power)
entries: Lord Syuul creates a sudden surge of energy in the mind of a creature he can see within 120 feet of him. The target must make a {@dc 19} Constitution saving throw, taking 77 ({@damage 14d10}) psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. If the target has a brain and is reduced to 0 hit points, their brain explodes, and if they can't survive without their brain, they die.

action.name: Flay (6th-Order Power)
entries: Lord Syuul shoots a 15-foot cone of psionic energy from his eyes. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 19} Intelligence saving throw, taking 35 ({@damage 10d6}) psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Memory Transfer
entries: Lord Syuul psionically plunders the mind of each creature he is grappling. Each target must succeed on a {@dc 19} Intelligence saving throw or take 44 ({@damage 8d10}) psychic damage. If a target fails their saving throw and doesn't escape the grapple by the end of their next turn, they must choose one of these effects:

items: The target's proficiency bonus drops to 0, they can't form new thoughts or speak, and they have disadvantage on all ability checks, attack rolls, and saving throws. Only the {@psionic cure ailment|TalPsi} power, a {@spell lesser restoration} spell, or a similar supernatural effect can end this effect. Additionally, until Lord Syuul finishes a long rest, he gains a cumulative +5 bonus to damage rolls.

The target is {@condition charmed} by Lord Syuul for 1 hour. While the target is {@condition charmed}, Lord Syuul can issue the target telepathic commands (no action required), which the target does their best to obey. Each time the target takes damage, they can make a {@dc 19} Wisdom saving throw, ending the effect on a success.

action.name: Guise (3rd-Order Power)
entries: Lord Syuul projects a psionic image over his body, transforming his appearance for 1 hour into that of a Medium creature he has seen. When he manifests this power, he can also change the appearance of any equipment he carries.

The changes wrought by this power fail to hold up to physical inspection. A creature can use an action to inspect Lord Syuul's appearance and make a {@dc 19} Intelligence ({@skill Investigation}) check, noticing the image is a projection on a success.

bonus.name: Grappling Jaunt
entries: Lord Syuul and each creature {@condition grappled} by him teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space he can see.

reaction.name: Brain Drain
entries: When a creature {@condition grappled} by Lord Syuul makes a saving throw against Memory Transfer, Lord Syuul momentarily weakens the creature and the creature has disadvantage on the saving throw.

legendaryHeader: Lord Syuul has three villain actions. He can take each action once during an encounter after an enemy's turn. He can take these actions in any order but can use only one per round.

legendary.name: Action 1: Mindblind
entries: Each enemy Lord Syuul can see within 60 feet of him must make a {@dc 19} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, a creature can't see creatures other than Lord Syuul for 1 minute (save ends at end of turn).

legendary.name: Action 2: Was I Ever Here?
entries: Lord Syuul becomes {@condition invisible}, teleports 60 feet to an unoccupied space he can see, and can take the Hide action. At the same time, an illusory psionic image of Lord Syuul appears in the space he left, gesturing, speaking, and behaving as he chooses (no action required). A creature who touches the image for the first time on a turn or makes a melee attack against it must succeed on a {@dc 19} Constitution saving throw or take 21 ({@damage 6d6}) psychic damage because things can pass through it. Lord Syuul's invisibility ends and his image disappears at the end of his next turn.

legendary.name: Action 3: Mindshatter
entries: Each enemy Lord Syuul can see within 60 feet of him must make a {@dc 19} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes 55 ({@damage 10d10}) psychic damage and is {@condition dazed|FleeMortals} for 1 minute (save ends at end of turn). On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage and isn't {@condition dazed|FleeMortals}.

hp.special: Seven times their level (number of d8 Hit Dice equal to their level)

action.name: Signature Attack (Psionic Pistol)
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 3 plus PB} to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 1d10 plus PB} force damage. Beginning at 7th level, the operative can make this attack twice, instead of once, when they take the Attack action on their turn.

action.name: 3rd Level: Phasing Charge (3/Day)
entries: When the operative hits a creature with a signature attack, they can attempt to teleport the target. The target must succeed on a {@dc 10 plus PB} Wisdom saving throw or be teleported up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space on the ground that the operative can see.

action.name: 5th Level: Telekinetic Repulsion (3/Day)
entries: As an action, the operative releases a powerful pulse of energy. Each enemy within 10 feet of the operative must make a {@dc 10 plus PB} Strength saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes {@damage PBd6} force damage and is pushed up to 10 feet directly away from the operative. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and isn't pushed.

action.name: 7th Level: Memory Thief (3/Day; 4th-Order Power; Concentration)
entries: The operative psionically plunders the mind of a creature they can see within 30 feet of them. The target must make a {@dc 10 plus PB} Intelligence saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes 22 ({@damage 4d10}) psychic damage, and for 1 minute, the target's proficiency bonus is cumulatively lowered by 1 and the infiltrator gains a cumulative +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls and to each feature's save DC. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage and doesn't have their proficiency bonus reduced.
A creature whose proficiency bonus drops to 0 can't form new thoughts or speak, and they have disadvantage on ability checks, attack rolls, and saving throws.

trait.name: Stubborn Rage
entries: The wyvern is immune to the {@condition frightened} and {@condition stunned} conditions while they have fewer than half their hit points or are within 60 feet of another wyvern they can hear or see.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The wyvern makes one Stinger attack and one Bite attack. They can replace one attack with a use of Tail Sweep.

action.name: Stinger
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 3d6 + 3}) piercing damage. The target must succeed on a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw or take 7 ({@damage 2d6}) acid damage at the start of each of their turns for 1 minute (save ends at end of turn). A {@psionic cure ailment|TalPsi} power or a {@spell lesser restoration} spell ends this effect on a target.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 2d12 + 3}) piercing damage. If the target is Large or smaller, they are {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 13}). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained} and the wyvern can't bite another target.

action.name: Tail Sweep
entries: The wyvern swipes their tail in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a {@dc 14} Strength saving throw or take 14 ({@damage 2d10 + 3}) bludgeoning damage and be pushed up to 10 feet away from the wyvern.

bonus.name: Seek
entries: The wyvern takes the Search action.

hp.special: 7 + seven times caregiver's level (number of d8 Hit Dice equal to their caregiver's level)

trait.name: Learning to Fly
entries: The wyvern has a flying speed of 10 × PB feet.

action.name: Signature Attack (Stinger)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3 plus PB} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 1d6 plus PB} piercing damage.

action.name: 1st Level: Acidic Sting (2 Ferocity)
entries: The wyvern makes a signature attack with a reach of 15 feet. On a hit, the attack deals an extra {@damage 0d1 + PB|PB} acid damage.

action.name: 3rd Level: Liquefied Meal (5 Ferocity)
entries: The wyvern pounces on a Large or smaller creature within 5 feet of them, attempting to melt their prey's flesh with acid and drink it. The target must succeed on a {@dc 10 plus PB} Dexterity saving throw or fall {@condition prone} and take {@damage 1d4 plus PB} acid damage. The wyvern gains temporary hit points equal to the acid damage dealt.

action.name: 5th Level: Tail Sweep (8 Ferocity)
entries: The wyvern sweeps their tail in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 10 plus PB} Strength saving throw or take {@damage PBd6} bludgeoning damage and be pushed up to 10 feet away from the wyvern.

reaction.name: Enraged Protector
entries: When a creature the wyvern can see within 30 feet of them reduces the wyvern's caregiver to 0 hit points or scores a critical hit against the caregiver, the wyvern can move up to their speed. If the wyvern ends this movement within 5 feet of the attacker, the wyvern can make a signature attack against them.

trait.name: Immutable Form
entries: The miner is immune to any power, spell, or effect that would alter their form.

trait.name: Supernatural Resistance
entries: The miner has advantage on saving throws against powers, spells, and other supernatural effects.

trait.name: Tunneler
entries: The miner can burrow through solid rock at half their burrowing speed and leaves a 5-foot-diameter tunnel in their wake.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The miner makes two attacks using Drill Press, Pneumatic Pick, or both.

action.name: Drill Press
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d8 + 6}) piercing damage. If the target is touching the ground, they are knocked {@condition prone} and {@condition restrained} by the miner's drill. While {@condition restrained} in this way, the target takes 15 ({@damage 2d8 + 6}) piercing damage at the start of each of their turns, and the miner can't make Drill Press attacks. The {@condition restrained} condition ends if the miner moves, makes a Drill Press attack, or is destroyed. The target or a creature who can reach them can use an action to pull the target away from the drill, ending the {@condition restrained} condition and dealing 15 ({@damage 2d8 + 6}) piercing damage to the target in the process.

action.name: Pneumatic Pick
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d10 + 6}) piercing damage. If the target is wearing mundane armor, their armor takes a permanent and cumulative -1 penalty to the AC it offers.
Armor reduced to an AC of 10 is destroyed.

action.name: Unload Rocks {@recharge}
entries: The miner hurls rocks and dirt in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 18} Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 44 ({@damage 8d10}) bludgeoning damage and is {@condition blinded} until the end of their next turn. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and is not {@condition blinded}.

bonus.name: Break Ground {@recharge}
entries: The miner strikes the ground and creates a fissure extending from them in a 30-foot-long, 5-foot-wide, 30-foot-deep line. Each Medium or smaller creature in that area must make a {@dc 18} Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature falls into the fissure, taking 10 ({@damage 3d6}) bludgeoning damage from the fall and landing {@condition prone}. On a successful save, a creature is shunted 5 feet into an unoccupied space and does not fall into the fissure. If a creature doesn't have an unoccupied space within 5 feet of them, they fall into the fissure.

trait.name: Churning Trunk
entries: Prone creatures can't make opportunity attacks against the cryptic, and the cryptic can move through spaces occupied by {@condition prone} creatures. The first time on a turn the cryptic moves through a space occupied by a {@condition prone} enemy, that enemy takes 7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The cryptic makes two Slam attacks and uses Stone Bone Storm.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Stone Bone Storm
entries: The cryptic breaks apart their body, driving a flurry of stones in a 5-foot-wide, 30-foot-long line originating from their space. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw, taking 18 ({@damage 4d8}) bludgeoning damage and falling {@condition prone} on a failed save, or taking half as much damage and not falling {@condition prone} on a successful one.
The fossil cryptic then reforms in an unoccupied space in the line's area.

action.name: Shatterstone {@recharge}
entries: The cryptic burrows up to half their speed. If the cryptic ends this movement within 5 feet of the surface, they can breach the surface. Each other creature within 20 feet of the cryptic when they breach must make a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw, taking 36 ({@damage 8d8}) bludgeoning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

bonus.name: Stoneshift
entries: The cryptic shifts the ground under the feet of one creature or object touching the ground within 30 feet of them. The target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw or be moved up to 15 feet horizontally. Objects automatically fail this saving throw.

monster.name: Koptourok
languages: understands the languages they knew in life but can't speak

trait.name: Breathless Aura
entries: Enemies within 30 feet of the koptourok can't speak, and if they are a creature who needs to breathe, they also have disadvantage on Constitution saving throws.

trait.name: Wings of Breath
entries: The koptourok gains a flying speed equal to their walking speed if they have at least one enemy within 30 feet of them. If the koptourok starts their turn in the air and doesn't have a flying speed, they fall.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The koptourok makes two Choking Grasp attacks.

action.name: Choking Grasp
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 30 ft., one creature. {@h}14 ({@damage 4d6}) bludgeoning damage, and the target is pulled to an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the koptourok and {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 14}). While {@condition grappled} in this way, the target is {@condition restrained} and the koptourok's speed isn't halved by the grapple.

action.name: Last Gasp
entries: The koptourok attempts to steal the breath from each creature they are grappling. Each target must make a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw, taking 14 ({@damage 4d6}) bludgeoning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The koptourok gains temporary hit points equal to 5 times the number of creatures who failed their save.

reaction.name: Thunderous Deflation
entries: When the koptourok drops to 30 hit points or fewer, they unleash a shrieking wail. Each creature within 30 feet of the koptourok must make a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 16 ({@damage 3d10}) thunder damage and is {@condition deafened} until the end of their next turn. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and isn't {@condition deafened}. The koptourok then releases all creatures they are grappling and flies up to their speed.

trait.name: Cave Apex
entries: The lamasombra's unnatural scales, padded feet, and bones allow them to avoid detection. They can't be detected with tremorsense. When the lamasombra is in darkness or dim light, they are {@condition invisible} to creatures with darkvision, but they are visible in dim light to creatures without darkvision.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The lamasombra can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The lamasombra makes one Bite attack and one Tongue attack.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}33 ({@damage 6d8 + 6}) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, they must succeed on a {@dc 17} Constitution saving throw or contract boiling wastes disease.
